column12: Systems and methods for efficient seating in amusement park venues
column13: A system for providing seating guidance for an attraction ride vehicle of an amusement park attraction includes a computing device associated with a display, one or more processors of the computing device, and one or more memory devices of the computing device storing information about the attraction ride vehicle and storing instructions corresponding to a seating application. The seating application, when executed by the one or more processors, causes the computing device to: provide an interface to receive seating input data for a guest or a group of guests, process the seating input data in combination with the information about the attraction ride vehicle based on seating logic to provide guidance data, and outputting guidance, based on the guidance data, for loading the guest or the group of guests onto the attraction ride vehicle via the display.
column15: LINGUANTI NICHOLAS;;LOUDEN JAKE;;CAREY BRIAN;;HARNED JESSICA;;BIAR ANDREW JACKSON
column32: PCT/US2019/031609 Search Report and Written Opinion dated Jun. 28, 2019.

column12: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR OPHTHALMIC DIGITAL DIAGNOSTICS VIA TELEMEDICINE
column13: Disclosed herein are methods, devices, and systems for the enhanced monitoring of visual function via telemedicine to detect early onset of changes and abnormalities associated with disease. The systems include a cloud environment or neural network communicating various tests and images to a client device in which a user/patient is properly positioned to view a display of the client device, receive stimuli, and provide patient input which is evaluated in terms of timing and substance to generate a contrast-sensitivity map of a visual function for the patient. Various ocular tests are described for implementation in a new home-based computer environment rather than using expensive and specific medical equipment in a doctor's office.

column12: Ship design error prediction system through model learning
column13: The present invention relates to a system for predicting errors in ship design by using model learning. More specifically, the present invention relates to a system for predicting errors in ship design by using model learning, which learns repeated errors through model learning for design errors including location change, piping class, size, and lack of space, thereby predicting errors in new ship design. To this end, the present invention provides the system for predicting errors in ship design by using model learning. The system comprises: a simulation module for performing simulation by using design information of a pre-designed ship, labeling errors that occur, and transmitting the same to a design error DB module; the design error DB module for storing the information received from the simulation module and transmitting the information to a data preprocessing module; the data preprocessing module for receiving the information stored in the design error DB module and preprocessing the same to perform model learning; a model learning module for performing model learning by using logistic regression for classification using a sigmoid function; a new ship information input module for generating a set of data by using the data pre-processing module in order to extract design information and compare the same with the learning model learned by the model learning module when information of a ship for which errors is to be predicted is input; an error prediction module for acquiring probabilities through a logistic linear regression model and generating expected error values by using Scikit-learn logistic regression analysis; and an integrated visualization module for displaying the error possibility analysis results for the new ship design information predicted by the error prediction module so that the user can see the same.

column12: GAMIFICATION FOR ONLINE SOCIAL COMMUNITIES
column13: Techniques for gamification for online social communities are described including receiving input data transferred from a client associated with an interaction on a website having one or more portions served from servers that are separate from each other, analyzing the input using a community analytic module to determine metrics associated with the interaction, the metrics having, at least, a first level, a second level, and a third level, the first level indicating a ranking associated with the input data, the second level being associated with feedback data transmitted by another client in response to the interaction, the third level being associated with generating one or more awards based on a determination generated by combining the first level and the second level, and storing metric data associated with the first level, the second level, the third level, the ranking, the feedback data, and the one or more awards.
column32: Gamification in an Online Community (Sanat Kumar Bista, Surya Nepal, Nathalie Colineau, Cecile Paris, 2012 IEE Publication) (Year: 2012)

column12: SERVICE SYSTEM AND METHOD OF ENHANCING USERS' CONCENTRATION
column13: The invention relates to a service system (1) for enhancing concentration of users including: a processor (11); an interactive interface (12) connected to the processor to communicate with a user device (2); and a storage device (12) associated with a processor, the storage device storing a database and a software, wherein the database (13) consists of a data area storing digital content, a data area storing question/requirements bank and a data area storing user scores; and wherein the software (18) which, when being executed by the processor (11) causes the service system (1) execution. Accordingly, it is possible to enhancing the concentration of users (3) through the application of gamification to the user's entertainment, studying, and research activities, and the user will be motivated and more interested. The invention also provides a method to enhance the user's concentration.

column12: GAMIFICATION-BASED MULTI-FACTOR AUTHENTICATION
column13: A method, system, and computer program product for gamification of multi-factor authentication are provided. The method receives an authentication request for a user. An application context is identified for the authentication request. A set of input devices are identified which are associated with an authentication system. Based on the application context and the set of input devices, a set of user interaction prompts are generated for the authorization request. The set of user interaction prompts correspond to one or more user interactions with one or more input devices. The set of user interaction prompts are presented within an audio-visual environment. Authentication data is captured from the one or more input devices during presentation of the set of user interaction prompts. The method authenticates the user based on the authentication data.

column12: 3D MODEL CREATION SUPPORT SYSTEM AND 3D MODEL CREATION SUPPORT METHOD
column13: An object of the invention is to efficiently create a 3D model of a plant with attributes from a 3D model of a plant with no attributes. In order to solve the above problems, in the invention, a connection information conversion part 5 converts a connection relationship of parts extracted from a 3D model with no attributes 2 into connection information of a system diagram, an extraction information comparing part 6 compares the connection information with the connection relationship extracted from an attribute system diagram to create an conversion correspondence DB 7, and a 3D model with attributes 9 is created based on the conversion correspondence DB from the 3D model with no attributes 2.

column12: Marble table vending machine
column13: The utility model provides a marble table vending machine which comprises a vending machine body, the vending machine body comprises a marble table game device and a vending machine storage unit, and the outer surface of the rear end of the marble table game device is connected with the outer surface of the front end of the vending machine storage unit. The marble table game equipment comprises a marble ejection activity area and a plurality of sets of marble recovery cells, and sensors are arranged in the multiple sets of marble recovery cells. According to the hoodle table vending machine, the hoodle table game device and the vending machine storage unit are arranged, gamification experience of hoodle table games is combined, a reward mechanism of high prizes is set according to a game mechanism, consumption frequency is stimulated through the gamification experience, and the market competitiveness is improved. And the marbles can be sold through the arranged vending machine storage unit, so that the commodity sales volume is increased, the operation is convenient, and the practicability of the whole waste container is improved.

column12: Virtual object control method and device, computer storage medium and electronic equipment
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of sports health, and provides a virtual object control method, a virtual object control device, a computer storage medium and electronic equipment, and the virtual object control method comprises the following steps: obtaining input information of a user in response to an operation that the user participates in a target activity; the input information is carried on a virtual object; determining a target data volume required for changing the state of the virtual object according to the input information; in response to a data volume increasing operation for the virtual object, updating the current data volume of the virtual object; the data volume increasing operation is used for distributing the data volume of an operation user to the virtual object; and when the current data volume is equal to the target data volume, controlling the virtual object to change from an original state to a target state. The exercise interestingness can be improved in a gamification mode, so that the exercise enthusiasm of the user is stimulated.

column12: Data center transformation systems and methods
column13: This disclosure relates to systems and methods for gamification of data center transformation. In one embodiment, a processor-implemented method is disclosed, comprising: dynamically generating in real-time, via a hardware processor, a multi-player gaming environment including a plurality of graphical elements; wherein at least one constraint applying to one of the graphical elements reflects a constraint applying to a real-world data center; wherein a configuration of at least one of the graphical elements reflects a configuration parameter of the real-world data center; providing, via the hardware processor, the gaming environment to a plurality of users; modifying, via the hardware processor, the configuration of the at least one of the graphical elements based on game play of the plurality of users; and providing, via the hardware processor, an output indicating a modified configuration of the at least one of the graphical elements for modifying the configuration parameter of the real-world data center.

column12: Initiating a device security setting on detection of conditions indicating a fraudulent capture of a machine-readable code
column13: There are provided systems and methods for initiating a device security setting on detection of conditions indicating a fraudulent capture of a machine-readable code. A service provider, such as an electronic transaction processor for digital transactions, may provide in-person or device-to-device data transfers through machine-readable codes, such as to effectuate a payment from one mobile device to another. However, unauthorized devices may be in close enough proximity to also capture the code and impermissibly use the code. Thus, device security settings are used to detect whether fraud may occur in certain settings and implement an operation to hide a valid code. This may include operations to obtain information for the unauthorized device, make the code dynamic, or mask the code in a display. Once a nearby valid scanner is detected, such as through emitted light or sound, the valid code may be displayed.

column12: Systems and methods for generating on-demand insurance policies
column13: An on-demand insurance (ODI) server for generating dynamic user offerings may be provided. The ODI server may include at least one processor in communication with a memory device. The at least one processor may be programmed to (i) receive, from a user computing device associated with a user, an insurance policy request for a trip from a start location to an end location, (ii) determine at least one transportation mode available for the trip, (iii) access contextual data associated with the trip, (iv) assess a risk associated with the at least one transportation mode, (v) calculate a risk score associated with the at least one transportation mode based upon at least the contextual data, (vi) generate an insurance offering associated with the at least one transportation mode, and/or (vii) transmit the insurance offering in real time to the user computing device for purchase by the user.

column12: ELECTRON BEAM INSPECTION APPARATUS AND ELECTRON BEAM INSPECTION METHOD
column13: An electron beam inspection apparatus according to one aspect of the present invention includes an image acquisition mechanism to acquire a secondary electron image by scanning a substrate, on which a figure pattern is formed, with an electron beam, and detecting a secondary electron emitted due to irradiation with the electron beam by the scanning, a resize processing unit to perform, using design pattern data being a basis of the figure pattern, resize processing on the figure pattern to enlarge its size in a scan direction of the electron beam, a first developed image generation unit to generate, using the design pattern data which has not been resized, a first developed image by developing an image of a design pattern of a region corresponding to the secondary electron image, a second developed image generation unit to generate, using partial patterns enlarged by the resize processing in the figure pattern having been resized, a second developed image by developing an image of partial patterns in a region corresponding to the secondary electron image, a map generation unit to generate a pseudo defect candidate pixel map which can identify a pseudo defect candidate pixel that has no pattern in the first developed image and has a pattern in the second developed image, a reference image generation unit to generate a reference image of the region corresponding to the second electron image, and a comparison unit to compare, using the pseudo defect candidate pixel map, the second electron image with the reference image of the region corresponding to the second electron image.

column12: RAPID DIGITAL NUCLEAR REACTOR DESIGN USING MACHINE LEARNING
column13: A method designs nuclear reactors using design variables and metric variables. A user specifies ranges for the design variables and threshold values for the metric variables and selects design parameter samples. For each sample, the method runs three processes, which compute metric variables for thermal-hydraulics, neutronics, and stress. The method applies a cost function to compute an aggregate residual of the metric variables compared to the threshold values. The method deploys optimization methods, either training a machine learning model using the samples and computed aggregate residuals, or using genetic algorithms, simulated annealing, or differential evolution. When using Bayesian optimization, the method shrinks the range for each design variable according to correlation between the respective design variable and estimated residuals using the machine learning model. These steps are repeated until a sample having a smallest residual is unchanged for multiple iterations. The final model assesses relative importance of each design variable.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHODS FOR EVALUATING BOTTLING LINE PERFORMANCE
column13: System and method for optimizing bottling line performance based on data received from a bottle with sensors. The system provides a bottle with sensors in a bottling line or maintenance system, a network gateway, a human machine interface (HMI) device, and a platform server. The HMI device provides for local control of the bottling line while the platform server handles distribution of GUIs, as well as data processing, data storage, and data analysis.

column12: Analog mixed-signal assertion-based checker system
column13: A design for an analog mixed-signal (AMS) circuit is accessed. An assertion for verifying the behavior of an analog signal in the AMS circuit is also accessed. The assertion is expressed in an assertion language for AMS circuits. A processor verifies the assertion against the predicted behavior of the analog signal in the AMS circuit. In various embodiments, the assertion language contains predefined classes for assertions in the temporal domain, for assertions in the frequency domain, and for assertions based on functional dependencies of an output analog signal on an input analog signal.

column12: ASSISTING USER ENGAGEMENT OF VEHICLE FEATURES
column13: A system and method of assisting user engagement of vehicle features, the method including: identifying a vehicle engagement feature from a plurality of vehicle engagement features; sending vehicle feature trigger information to a vehicle, the vehicle feature trigger information being information used to detect an occurrence of a vehicle feature trigger that corresponds to the identified vehicle engagement feature; transmitting a vehicle feature engagement notification to a vehicle user of the vehicle, the vehicle feature engagement notification including vehicle feature operating instructions and/or a vehicle feature availability notification; and receiving a vehicle feature usage indicator, the vehicle feature usage indicator indicating that the vehicle user has engaged the identified vehicle engagement feature, wherein the vehicle feature usage indicator is generated by a vehicle system module (VSM) of the vehicle in response to detection of the occurrence of the vehicle feature trigger at the vehicle.

column12: Scenario Gamification to Provide Improved Mortgage and Securitization
column13: Systems and processes for the gamification of data, including providing scenarios and actionable elements to execute a preferred scenario. Embodiments can include a credit modification software tool that is configured to automate the transmission of one or more messages to effectuate modification of a credit score associated with a user. The system can determine accounts eligible for improvements, application amounts, time to apply, and determine the effect on user's credit score. Embodiments can include scenarios for increasing a user's credit score where funds are not available by applying for a loan to reduce rolling debts, thereby providing a net increase credit score. Loans can be negotiated based on the resulting credit score and autonomously implement. A universal payment system is disclosed to retrieve data and determine a transaction model, which determines the accounts to be used, in which order, and how much to be applied, in order to benefit a credit score.

column12: Patient-specific dental prosthesis and gingival contouring developed by predictive modeling
column13: A method of designing a patient-specific prosthesis for a current patient includes receiving scan data of a mouth of the current patient to identify conditions at a location at which the patient-specific prosthesis is to be placed on a dental implant, and determining at least two clinical factors for the current patient. The method further includes identifying a desired outcome for soft tissue for the current patient at the location, and accessing a database having soft-tissue-outcome information for each of a plurality of previous patients. The database further includes clinical-factor information for each of the plurality of previous patients. Based on the soft-tissue-outcome information and the clinical-factor information for at least one of the plurality of previous patients being related to the current patient's desired outcome and the current patient's at least two clinical factors, the method includes developing a design for the patient-specific prosthesis for the current patient.

column12: Customized snack delivery systems and methods using design and scanning
column13: The present invention relates to a system and method for providing a customized snack using design and scanning, comprising the steps of: receiving a request for an order from a buyer; scanning a desired design through a 3D scanner; producing a customized snack based on a scanned shape; and providing a customized snack having the desired design. The system and method for providing a customized snack using design and scanning scan a desired shape with a 3D scanner, insert a filament that is a material of a desired snack based on the scanned shape, and provide a customized snack in the scanned shape.

column12: Urban operation sign evaluation method
column13: The invention relates to an urban operation sign evaluation method, which comprises the following steps of: investigating and surveying urban operation big data in each field, and establishing an urban operation index evaluation dimension; establishing a multi-level urban operation evaluation index system based on the urban operation index evaluation dimension; establishing an urban operation sign index weight system based on the urban operation evaluation index system; according to the city operation index data of the selected city, establishing a city operation sign index evaluation standard; and establishing an urban operation sign evaluation model and performing comprehensive rating. According to the urban operation sign evaluation method, a set of urban operation sign index system and index evaluation system based on top-level design is established, a plurality of urban operation index evaluation dimensions are included, and the urban operation sign evaluation can be performed according to the overall state of urban operation. Through a dynamic urban sign monitoring system, the real-time operation state of a city and the spatial-temporal distribution of each main body can be quantitatively evaluated in a more real-time, accurate and multi-dimensional manner.

column12: PATTERN EDGE DETECTING METHOD, PATTERN EDGE DETECTING APPARATUS, AND RECORDING MEDIUM FOR RECORDING PROGRAM FOR CAUSING COMPUTER TO EXECUTE PATTEN EDGE DETECTION
column13: To provide a pattern edge detecting method which can detect an edge (contour) of a pattern on an image without using design data of the pattern.SOLUTION: A pattern edge detecting method according to the present invention has steps of generating an object image of a target pattern formed on a work piece, generating a feature vector representing a plurality of feature amounts of each pixel of the object image, inputting the feature vector to a model constructed by machine learning, outputting, from the model, a determination result indicating whether a pixel having the feature vector is a pixel on an edge part or a pixel on a non-edge part, and generating a virtual edge by linking a plurality of pixels having the feature vectors with the determination result indicating that the pixel is the pixel on an edge part.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 5

column12: Manufacturing method of 3D printing fiber composite grating reinforced thermoplastic thin-wall structure
column13: The invention relates to a manufacturing method of a 3D printing fiber composite grating reinforced thermoplastic thin-wall structure, which comprises the following steps of: preparing a continuous fiber composite material grating matched with the thin-wall structure in shape by utilizing a continuous fiber 3D printing technology, and carrying out induction welding on the continuous fiber composite material grating and the thermoplastic thin-wall structure to obtain the 3D printing fiber composite grating reinforced thermoplastic thin-wall structure. And the 3D printing fiber composite grating reinforced thermoplastic thin-wall structure is obtained. According to the self-heating principle of the fiber composite material grating under the high-frequency alternating electric field, local secondary melting of the thermoplastic material at the designated position is achieved, and therefore good interface bonding is formed between the reinforced grating and the thin-wall structure. Compared with the prior art, the method is high in manufacturing efficiency and low in cost, and the obtained structure has the characteristics of light weight, high strength, high rigidity, high performance designability and the like.

column12: Navigation system and method in driving process
column13: The invention relates to a navigation system and method in a driving process, and the system comprises a data module which is used for obtaining navigation data of a target road and identifying key guide points in the navigation data, and the key guide points comprise an intersection, a lane change and a ramp; the game prop guide module comprises a plurality of virtual game props which are arranged at intervals along a planned path in front of or behind the key guide point, and is used for guiding the vehicle to run according to the planned path; the feedback module is used for acquiring the current position of the vehicle on the navigation interface in real time in the vehicle driving process, and sending feedback when the vehicle passes through the position of the virtual game prop; wherein the feedback mode comprises audio, video or combination of the audio and the video. According to the method, the gamification content is loaded into the navigation interface, a virtualized vehicle map is not needed, a real interface of navigation data is not influenced, interference to real-time driving of a user is reduced, and guide information is clarified.

column12: - 2- METHOD FOR CO-DESIGN OF HARDWARE AND NEURAL NETWORK ARCHITECTURES USING COARSE-TO-FINE SEARCH TWO-PHASED BLOCK DISTILLATION AND NEURAL HARDWARE PREDICTOR
column13: Methods, systems, and an apparatus for combined or separate implementation of coarse-to-fine neural architecture search (NAS), two-phase block NAS, variable hardware prediction, and differential hardware design are provided and described. A variable predictor is trained, as described herein. Then, a controller or a policy may be used to iteratively modify a neural network architecture along dimensions formed by neural network architecture parameters. The modification is applied to blocks (e.g., subnetworks) within the neural network architecture. In each iteration, the remainder of the neural network architecture parameters are modified and learned with a differential NAS method. The training process is performed with two-phase block NAS and incorporates a variable hardware predictor to predict power, performance, and area (PPA) parameters. The hardware parameters may be learned as well using the variable hardware predictor. According to the present invention, the method for the efficient and high-performance design of the neural network architectures and corresponding hardware architectures is provided.

column12: Game design method, bowling scoring game system and readable storage medium
column13: The invention provides a game design method, a bowling scoring game system and a computer readable storage medium. The game design method comprises the following steps: a cloud server adjusts an initialized award winning probability by using user data to obtain a first award winning probability; the cloud server adjusts the first award winning probability by using the global recovery rate in the gymnasium operation data to obtain a second award winning probability; the cloud server adjusts the second award winning probability by using the award pool water line data to obtain a target award winning probability; the cloud server generates a game scheme based on the target award winning probability; and the cloud server generates a game result based on the real-time game data of the user and the generated game scheme, and displays the game result on a fairway display screen and/or a user mobile terminal. Through the mode, the game design method utilizes the real-time user data, the gymnasium operation data and the prize pool water line data to customize the game winning probability of the bowling game, so that digital and gamification innovation of the bowling is realized.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHODS FOR PROCESSING AN ORTHODONTIC ALIGNER BY MEANS OF AN OPTICAL COHERENCE TOMOGRAPHY
column13: Methods and apparatuses for 3D imaging (including 3D optical coherence tomography imaging) to measure the shape of orthodontic aligners, teeth, and other oral structures simultaneously, in-vivo or in-vitro. These methods and apparatuses may be used to determine contact locations of aligners with teeth and/or teeth with other teeth with very high precision, including determining the size of gaps where they are not in contact. These measurements may be used design, modify or replace an aligner and/or to verify aligner fit. 3D models of the whole aligner and teeth may be generated.

column12: COMPUTER-AIDED PROCESS PLANNING (CAPP) FOR AUTOMATED FIBER PLACEMENT (AFP) MANUFACTURING
column13: Automated Fiber Placement (AFP) manufacturing with carbon fiber composites is increasingly used for complex and/or large structures. Computer-Aided Process Planning (CAPP) software supports process planning for AFP manufacturing to assist identifying optimal starting point location and layup strategy for each laminate ply. Ply optimization functions on measurement and scoring of geometry-based defects (gaps, overlaps, angle deviation, and steering). CAPP mitigates defect stacking through the laminate thickness by generating best ply scenarios and comparing ply defects to identify regions where defects are stacking up. Stacked defects frequency and severity are described using a disclosed scoring system, so process planners can craft fiber paths that mitigate the number and compounding effect of laminate geometry-based defects. Defects can be minimized in the process planning phase by optimizing the selection of input parameters such as starting points, layup strategies, and tows per course, using surrogate-based methods.

column12: Register transfer level design memory order detection method and device, storage medium and terminal
column13: The invention discloses a register transfer level design memory order detection method and device, a storage medium and a terminal. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a signal in a transfer level design simulation verification process of a register to be detected, and dynamically generating a detection model based on the signal to perform memory sequence detection; after a storage operation submission time point signal is collected, converting the submission data signal into local data and storing the local data in a local space; when a storage operation global visible time point signal is collected, converting local data into global visible data, and storing the global visible data in a global visible space; and when a loading operation execution completion time point is collected, generating a loading completion information item according to the execution completion data signal, storing the operation completion information item in a corresponding local loading completion information table, and when a loading operation submission time point signal is collected, reading the loading operation completion information item to perform memory sequence detection. According to the method, the register transfer level design memory sequence detection process is simplified.

column12: Virtual simulation method for predicting falling of spherical hinge under impact working condition
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of automobile virtual performance, in particular to a virtual simulation method for predicting falling of a spherical hinge under an impact working condition, which comprises the following steps of S1, testing to obtain mechanical property curves of different types of spherical hinges, S2, performing data processing on the mechanical property curve, inputting the mechanicalproperty curve into a spherical hinge virtual grid model to perform test condition simulation in the step S1, and performing benchmarking verification on a simulation result and the mechanicalproperty curve, S3, performing suspension sub-system trolley test and simulation verification on the spherical hinge virtual grid model subjected to part verification calculation, outputting a failure result, and returning to S2 when the failure result is out of a preset error range, and S4, when the failure result is within the precision range, adding the spherical hinge virtual grid model into the wholeautomobile virtual model for simulation, comparing the simulation result with a wholeautomobile 25% offset test result, and returning to S3 when the comparison result is beyond a preset error range. According to the method, the hinge failure of the vehicle under the front 25% offset collision working condition is predicted, and the suspension system is better guided to be matched with the safety performance design.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR TARGETED AND CUSTOMIZABLE ADVERTISING AND ENHANCED HYGIENE USING INTEGRATED BLOCKCHAIN MANAGEMENT
column13: Highly customized and targeted communications content may be pre-programmed or customized, configured, and delivered "on the fly" by an interactive media communication system comprising a network connected video screen and faucet combination. Individual and aggregated statistics about encounters with the content may be captured. Each unit in the network will also capture encounter-specific data to associate with each person and encounter such as dwell time in general, dwell time as a function of displayed media, environmental conditions, time of day, presence of other people, location of encounter, etc. In addition to targeted marketing, the interactive media communication system may be used to stimulate and motivate enhanced hygiene by introducing media elements and "gamification" into the hand washing ritual. Management can track employee and guest compliance with idealized hand washing activity.

column12: Personalized cognitive training system of cognitive evaluation result based on game behavior analysis
column13: The invention is suitable for the technical field of behavior cognition, and provides a game behavior analysis-based cognitive evaluation result personalized cognitive training system, which comprises a data pre-input module, a real-time interaction module, a communication module, a general computing equipment module, a storage module and a result display module, wherein the data pre-entry module comprises a demographic information unit and a cognitive scale information unit; the real-time interaction module comprises a game behavior data unit and a system feedback data unit, and the real-time interaction module is used for collecting game behavior data of a user and giving interactive feedback to the game behavior data so as to carry out cognitive training; the general-purpose computing equipment module comprises a norm analysis unit, an evaluation result analysis unit, a real-time training content unit and a personalized training scheme unit. The method does not depend on manpower for evaluation, so that the labor cost is reduced; according to the gamification evaluation method, several hours required by scale evaluation are shortened to 10-20 minutes, and the time cost is greatly reduced.
column14: SHENZHEN NAOWUNAO NETWORK TECH CO LTD

column12: 3 Method and system for the automatic 3 dimesional mold design
column13: The present invention relates to a system and a method for automatically designing a 3D mold by using knowledge-based mold design software and, more particularly, to a system and a method for automatically designing a 3D mold by using a program, which can extract and store corresponding design data and various design knowledge from a completed mold design, can previously analyze the shape of a product and thus automatically identify required molds when a similar mold is designed later, and can automatically graft suitable data among pre-stored design data so that design can be made automatically, thereby increasing working speed according to design of the similar mold, and can obtain know-how according to the mold design and can maintain design accuracy at all times regardless of an operator in the process thereof, thereby increasing design efficiency. The system comprises a design knowledge base construction module for extracting and storing knowledge information from existing mold design results, a design implementation module for implementing a new mold design by using design knowledge information stored in a design knowledge module; and a control module.

column12: Game behavior analysis-based cognitive disorder assessment method and system
column13: The invention discloses a cognitive impairment assessment method and system based on game behavior analysis, and relates to the technical field of cognitive impairment assessment, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining basic information of a user; determining game attributes from the game information table according to the basic information, and generating a personal evaluation game group according to the game attributes; the association relationship between game attributes and user types is stored in the game information table, and the game attributes comprise the coverage rate and difficulty of games corresponding to cognitive impairment items; and sequentially executing the personal evaluation game groups, obtaining game behavior data corresponding to the user, and performing cognitive disorder evaluation on the user based on the game behavior data. According to the method, the difference of individual attributes is considered, the method has the advantages of individuation, gamification and high precision, the cognitive competence of the user can be better evaluated, and an important reference basis is provided for prevention and treatment of cognitive impairment of old people.
column14: SHANGHAI BOSITENG NETWORK TECH CO LTD

column12: Power validation based on power assertion specification
column13: A method is provided for performing power validation on an integrated circuit (IC) design based on a power assertion specification. The method includes receiving the power assertion specification for the IC design, where the power assertion specification includes a predicted power consumption. Power consumption of the IC design is estimated according to power assertions specified in the power assertion specification. The estimated power consumption is compared against the predicted power consumption included in the power assertion specification. The IC design is determined to be associated with a power assertion failure based on results of the comparing. In response to determining that the IC design is associated with the power assertion failure, the IC design is refined to remedy the power assertion failure.

column12: Chip design data processing method, electronic equipment and computer readable medium
column13: The invention discloses a chip design data processing method, electronic equipment and a computer readable medium, and the method comprises the steps: configuring a first process parameter of a chip substrate layout design program, the first process parameter being adaptive to a second process parameter of a PCB board level design program; based on the first process parameter, executing a chip substrate layout design program to obtain conductive pattern source data; and performing parameter character processing adaptive to the PCB level design program on the conductive pattern source data to generate processed conductive pattern source data, and outputting the processed conductive pattern source data. According to the method, the chip packaging substrate design and the BALL MAP design can be carried out in the chip substrate layout design program, and data multiplexing between the chip substrate layout design program and the PCB level design program can be realized, so that the efficiency and the accuracy of the whole chip substrate design are improved.

column12: TEXTILE COMPUTING SYSTEM WITH DISTRIBUTED ARCHITECTURE
column13: A textile computing platform and method of operating the same. The platform includes at least one textile and at least one computing node including a sensory device positioned at the at least one textile. The platform includes a gateway device coupled to the computing node. The gateway device may be configured to: transmit, via a textile communication network, a discovery signal and a network time protocol signal; receive node discovery data from computing nodes to enumerate a subset of computing nodes for a current textile system state; generate physiological analytics based on a series of sensory data records received from the enumerated subset of computing nodes, the respective sensory data records associated with a time-stamp based on the network time protocol signal; and transmit actuating signals to the one or more enumerated subset of computing nodes for generating feedback to a user on a substantially real time basis.

column12: Scenario gamification to provide actionable elements and temporally appropriate advertising
column13: System and processes for facilitating the gamification of data, including providing scenarios and actionable elements to allow a user to execute at least one preferred or optimal scenario. The system may collate variables autonomously or variables may be entered by a user, the process may include an analysis step whereby, based on the source, trends, and variation of the variables entered, the process presents gamified scenarios and actionable elements. Within a scenario, the user may then manipulate one or more of the outcomes until at least one desired or optimal scenario is achieved. The user may then action various actionable elements to implement the desired or optimal scenario in a real-world situation. The scenarios provided may be aggregated and presented to a user to further enhance the desired or optimal outcome. The system may use the scenarios to provide temporally relevant advertising or notifications pertinent to a user's real-world actions.
column32: U.S. Appl. No. 16/678,952, filed Nov. 8, 2019 Non-Final Office Action dated Oct. 1, 2021.

column12: DATA FEED INTERACTION INCENTIVIZATION SYSTEM USING GAMIFICATION TOOLS
column13: Examples provide a personalized data feed having progress indicators showing progress indicators associated with goal-related action items in the feed to assist users in achieving personalized objectives. A goal-related progress indicator is generated within the personalized data feed indicating a user's progress towards completing the goal. A per-item progress indicator is generated for each uncompleted item indicating additional predicted progress towards achieving the personalized goal if the item is completed by the user. A visual augmentation is provided within the data feed to identify items in the feed which assist the user in achieving the personalized goal, such as documents to read or review. This motivates the user to interact with the item to work towards completing their goal, as well as provides a comparative and/or quantitative measure of potential goal-related benefit to be gained by interacting with various items in the feed.

column12: System and Method Of Lender, Borrower, and Employee Driven Enrollment
column13: Systems and processes for the gamification of data, including providing scenarios and actionable elements to execute a preferred scenario. Embodiments include providing access to a plurality of users such as a lender and a borrower, who can then collaborate to agree on a financial model to achieve a future credit score. The lender can then provide a loan based on the future credit score contingent on correct implementation of the financial model. The system can monitor changes in the borrower's credit score to confirm implementation, or reassess the financial model. The borrower and/or lender can share a summary of the financial model, and other details with non-users of the system or non-subscriber lenders of the system. Demonstrated results, tailored models, and trust in the recommender motivates the user and/or non-subscriber lender to enroll. Additional benefits can be achieved through bulk underwriting of common groups through driving lender and borrower enrollment.

column12: BIM (Building Information Modeling)-based earth-rock volume calculation method, system and equipment and storage medium
column13: The invention relates to the field of civil engineering, in particular to a BIM (Building Information Modeling)-based earth-rock volume calculation method, system and device and a storage medium, the method comprises the following steps: acquiring original site topographic data, the original site topographic data comprising three-dimensional coordinate data of original site topography; generating a three-dimensional curved surface model of the original site according to the topographic data of the original site; creating a site leveling design curved surface model according to site leveling design requirements; and comparing the original site three-dimensional curved surface model with the site leveling design curved surface model to obtain the earth and rock volume required to be excavated and backfilled. The original site and site leveling design are modeled and compared through the BIM technology, the slope can be made to the terrain curved surface according to a certain slope ratio, accurate digging and filling balance is achieved, and therefore the amount of earth and rocks needing to be dug and backfilled for site leveling is accurately calculated, adjusting operation is reduced, the adjusting result is displayed in real time, and the working efficiency is improved. The design is optimized to the maximum extent, and digging and filling balance is achieved.

column12: PERSONAL FITNESS TRAINING SYSTEM WITH BIOMEDICAL FEEDBACK
column13: Techniques and apparatuses describe an example personal fitness training computing system with biomechanical feedback to provide customized personal fitness training. The computing system generates a portrayal representative of a person identified for participating in the personal fitness training. The portrayal is displayed on a display device communicating with the computing system. A physical activity of the person is monitored during the personal fitness training. Feedback relative to the physical activity is then displayed on the display device. The feedback includes a biomechanical indication of the physical activity represented with respect to the portrayal of the person.

column12: Systems and methods to achieve tailored fluid and energy interaction through surface texturing
column13: Systems and methods for tailoring fluid and energy interaction through surface texturing. The methods comprise: receiving behavior input data specifying known or modeled interactions between a material and pre-solved solution surfaces, discrete input data specifying parameters of a surface to be textured, and continuous input data specifying ranges of values for environmental characteristics that the surface is to be subjected to during use; transforming the behavior input data into a composite response surface comprising a weighted combination of the pre-solved solution surfaces generated based on the discrete input data and the continuous input data; determining an optimized surface texture for the surface based on the composite response surface and desired behavior data specifying a desired interaction between the material and the surface to be textured; and outputting the optimized surface texture (e.g., to a surface texturing machine) so that the optimized surface texture is applied to the surface.

column12: 3D display device and design method
column13: The embodiment of the invention discloses a 3D display device and a design method. The design method of one specific embodiment comprises the steps of determining physical parameters about pixel units based on a target size and a target resolution of the display panel; based on the physical parameters about the pixel units and the target main lobe angle, the spacing distance between the surface, deviating from the light-emitting side of the display panel, of the lens layer and the surface, facing the light-emitting side, of the pixel units is determined; and determining physical parameters about the lens layer based on the physical parameters about the pixel units, the spacing distance and a target viewing distance. According to the design method provided by the embodiment of the invention, optimal performance design can be realized, large design requirements can be met, low crosstalk can be realized, and the designed 3D display device is compact in structure and has a wide application prospect.

column12: Personalized nerve regulation cognitive training system based on game behavior evaluation
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of nerve training, and particularly discloses a personalized nerve regulation and control cognitive training system based on game behavior evaluation. The system comprises a data pre-entry module, a real-time interaction module, a stimulation module, a storage module, a result display module, a communication module and a general computing device, evaluation does not depend on manpower, so that the labor cost is reduced, the time cost is greatly reduced through a gamification evaluation method, evaluation scores are based on objective behavior data of users, and the evaluation efficiency is improved. The problem of subjective scoring is avoided, accurate and targeted training can be carried out on each cognitive function unit for users with different cognitive levels, great potential advantages are provided for improvement of the training effect, the users can actively participate in cognitive training so as to generate cognitive-related neural circuit action potentials, and the cognitive training efficiency is improved. Furthermore, the activity effect is enhanced by means of transcranial electricity and transcranial magnetic stimulation, so that the purpose of enhancing the intervention effect is achieved.
column14: SHENZHEN NAOWUNAO NETWORK TECH CO LTD

column12: Lamp light distribution design method based on dimensional tolerance Monte-Carlo analysis
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of lighting lamp optical design, in particular to a lamp light distribution design method based on dimensional tolerance Monte-Carlo analysis, which comprises the following steps: step 1, establishing an incidence relation between a key distance and a beam angle through optical design simulation; step 2, determining a plurality of part parameters related to the key spacing and sizes of the plurality of part parameters; step 3, evaluating the dimensional tolerance process control capability of the plurality of part parameters, and determining dimensional tolerance distribution of each part parameter; 4, within the dimensional tolerance distribution range of the multiple part parameters, probability distribution of the key spacing is obtained through calculation with a Monte-Carlo statistical method; 5, according to the incidence relation between the key distance and the beam angle and the probability distribution of the key distance, whether the beam angle meets the light distribution performance design requirement or not is calculated. Whether the part production process and the process control capability meet the light distribution performance design requirements can be predicted, and theoretical analysis guidance is provided for part size adjustment.

column12: Game type active and passive rehabilitation training device based on single-shaft motor stress
column13: The invention discloses a game type active and passive rehabilitation training device based on single-shaft motor stress. Stress on the left and right sides can be obtained through the collection opportunity and calculation by collecting the stress of a single-shaft motor and without deploying force sensors on handles/pedals; and the stress calculation is converted into a turning angle in the gameto realize turning of the patient in the game, so that gamified interactive training is completed. According to the invention, the game experience is further improved through an automatic direction aligning mechanism; according to the method, boring monotonous training is changed into actively participated gamification interactive training, so that the active training consciousness of the patientcan be improved, and finally, the training effect is effectively enhanced.
column14: NANJING VISHEE MEDICAL TECH CO LTD

column12: User design synthesis method and device, equipment, medium and product
column13: The invention discloses a user design integration method and device, equipment, a medium and a product, and relates to the technical field of electronic design automation. The user design synthesis method comprises the following steps: acquiring a target register transfer-level design file and a standard process library set supported by a logic synthesis tool; analyzing the target register transfer level design file to obtain a plurality of user design modules and design constraints corresponding to each user design module; for the first user design module, a first standard process library meeting the design constraint of the first user design module is determined from the standard process library set, and the first user design module is any one user design module in the multiple user design modules; and synthesizing the first user design module by utilizing the logic synthesis tool and the first standard process library. According to the embodiment of the invention, the process library calling efficiency can be improved.

column12: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR OPENING EUSTACHIAN TUBES
column13: Systems and methods for opening the eustachian tubes of a subject are provided. Aspects of the systems include: a swallow inducer; a nasal passage seal; a pressure source configured to apply positive pressure to a sealed nasal passage; a sensor configured to detect a parameter indicative of a swallow resultant palate closure; and a controller operably coupled to the pressure source and the sensor, wherein the controller is configured to cause the pressure source to apply positive pressure to a sealed nasal passage upon detection by the sensor of the parameter indicative of a swallow resultant palate closure. Also provide are methods of using the systems to open eustachian tubes. The systems and methods find use in a variety of different applications, e.g., the treatment of a subject for Otitis Media with Effusion (OME).

column12: Cognitive training system for attention departure defect of children with developmental reading disorder
column13: The invention discloses a cognitive training system for attention disengagement defects of developmental reading disorder children. The system comprises a user interface, a game process and a management background. The user interface comprises a prompt setting module, a mode selection module and a level selection module. The game interface is used for completing the whole process of the game. The management background comprises a game parameter setting part, a game level setting part and a data recording part. The device is high in pertinence and convenient to use, the central clue is arranged to assist in promoting attention separation of children, the assisting effect of the central clue is gradually canceled through a gradual hiding method, and the attention separation difficulty of DD children is improved. By adopting a gamification method, game roles and interface design are vivid and lively and accord with the age characteristics of children, game playing methods and modes are rich and diversified, the learning interest and motivation of the children can be stimulated, and the participation degree and continuity of the children can be improved.

column12: Performance design and optimization method and device for loudspeaker cover of door protection plate of passenger car
column13: The invention relates to a passenger car door protection plate loudspeaker cover performance design and optimization method and device, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the geometric data of a door protection plate, and checking the data; grid division is carried out on the vehicle door protection plate assembly; checking the quality of the grid; the vehicle door protection plate model is assembled; carrying out material attribute endowing; performing modal simulation analysis, and performing connection check on the model according to a modal result; setting a contact relation; performing rigid ball impact simulation analysis, including three working conditions of normal temperature, low temperature and high temperature; and carrying out structure optimization analysis. The device comprises a grid division module, a grid quality inspection module, a model assembly module, an attribute endowing module, a load setting module, a simulation analysis module and a structure optimization module. According to the method, in the product design stage, the rigidity and strength performance of the loudspeaker cover of the vehicle door protection plate can be predicted, the structure is optimized, the development period of the vehicle door protection plate is effectively shortened, the development efficiency of the vehicle door protection plate is improved, digital intelligent simulation of the vehicle door protection plate product is achieved, and the development efficiency of the product is improved.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR MINDSET TRAINING
column13: The present invention relates to a software-based system and method of mindset training with gamification, implemented on stand-alone computing devices or over a network using computing devices. More specifically, the present invention relates to modifying the mindset of users of the system and method by means of mindset goal specification and corresponding mindset content curation, mindset conditioning games, social network engagement, and performance tracking.

column12: Fitness task map construction method and device, equipment and storage medium
column13: The invention provides a fitness task map construction method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of data processing, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a user fitness scene, obtaining a first fitness task scheme according to the user fitness scene, and then dividing the first fitness task scheme, obtaining a division result of each first fitness task scheme, constructing a task stage map and corresponding customs clearance evaluation content according to the division results, and finally forming a fitness task map according to the task stage map and the customs clearance evaluation content. Different target crowds are clustered respectively to form a personalized first fitness task scheme, a task stage map is generated by performing gamification division on fitness tasks, a fitness task map is further generated, a scientific excitation fitness management system is formed, a user is excited to perform multi-dimensional, integrated and progressive autonomous movement, the comprehensive management of the self health level is realized, and the user is helped to scientifically and comprehensively improve the body health level.

column12: Multi-type and multi-professional-part same-design simulation platform architecture method and device
column13: The invention discloses a multi-type and multi-professional-part same-design simulation platform architecture method and device. The method comprises the steps: constructing a product principle designobject and object hierarchical structure oriented to logic design activities and a product structure design object and object hierarchical structure oriented to physical design activities; accordingto the product principle design object, the object hierarchical structure, the product structure design object and the object hierarchical structure, determining an association relationship between the product principle design object and the product structure design object, and generating a multi-dimensional data management mechanism based on a parameter-level design object model; according to a multi-dimensional data management mechanism based on a parameter-level design object model, in the execution process of application program packaging, automatically managing design iteration process data in real time, and keeping the incidence relation of the design iteration process data, so barriers among different types of engine designs can be broken through, and knowledge sharing and accumulation are supported; wherein the process library, the model library, the tool library and the knowledge base are shared, and design knowledge and design experience are shared.

column12: Optimization design method before implementation of engineering processing in AltiumDesigner software
column13: The invention provides an optimal design (DFX) method used before engineering processing is achieved in board level design software Altium Designer. According to the method, processing capability data (including process compensation) of a circuit board factory is embedded into a design rule of Altium Designer software, online design rule inspection of the Altium Designer software is utilized, design and manufacturing are dynamically combined, and optimal design (DFX) of electronic products before engineering processing from board-level design to manufacturing stage is achieved.

column12: Theme park gamification, guest tracking and access control system
column13: A system for providing gamification of a destination such as a theme park where guests use a venue app with an optional electronic ticket that allows for both self-serve access into the destination and tracking of individual guests throughout various access points. An extended range ID such as an RFID is provided to the guest either in the electronic ticket or in a wearable. Using combinations of RFID readers, pressure sensors and cameras the system tracks guests down the ride seat and tracks the movements of guided, free-floating and free-ranging vehicles. Using the combination of guest and vehicle tracking information along with information provided by a destination gaming system, the destination guest experience is customized including various effects for rides and attractions. Spot cameras are placed at tracked locations such as rides seats, where images are captured in response to either external triggers generated by the system or guest indications.

column12: METAL DECO DIGITAL PROOFING PROCESS
column13: The described herein is a method for identifying a best match to a metal deco target color and distributing the best match to interested parties for ongoing validation. The method creates a digital proofing database that matches, for example, PantoneLIVE™ target colors and sets a defined digital inkjet standard to within desired tolerances. Also described is a system that implements the method.

column12: METHOD OF VERIFYING SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE, METHOD OF DESIGNING AND MANUFACTURING SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE USING THE SAME, AND SYSTEM PERFORMING THE SAME
column13: In a method of verifying a semiconductor device, input data defining the semiconductor device including a plurality of blocks is received. A first simulation environment is generated for a top module and at least one target block of the plurality of blocks in the top module. The first simulation environment includes power wiring information and additional power-related information. The top module represents an entire structure of the semiconductor device. A second simulation environment is generated for non-target blocks of the plurality of blocks other than the at least one target block. The second simulation environment is different from the first simulation environment. A verification operation is performed on the semiconductor device based on a hybrid simulation environment in which the first simulation environment and the second simulation environment are combined.

column12: System and method for iterative generating and testing of application code
column13: A method begins by generating application system state transitions from inputted requirements and parameters. For a current implementation of generating application code, the method continues by entering a loop. The loop begins by generating a current intermediate result based on a previous implementation and in accordance with current application code development factors. The loop continues by generating at least one test case based on the one or more of the application system state transitions. The loop continues by testing the current intermediate result in accordance with the at least one test case. When the testing is unfavorable, the loop continues by modifying one or more of: the one or more of the plurality of application system state transitions, the one or more of the parameters, and the one or more implementation tools. The loop then continues by repeating the loop using the modified current application code development factors.

column12: Design image adaptive enhancement method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of image data processing, in particular to a design image adaptive enhancement method, which comprises the following steps: acquiring a gray scale design image, and carrying out region division on the gray scale design image; determining an absolute difference entropy corresponding to the material region; determining a pseudo edge tendency corresponding to the material region; carrying out classification processing on pixel points in the gray scale design image to obtain a pixel point category set; determining two suppression coefficients corresponding to the pixel points in each pixel point category in the pixel point category set; determining an enhancement coefficient corresponding to a pixel point in each pixel point category in the pixel point category set; and enhancing the gray values of the pixel points in the pixel point category. According to the invention, data processing is carried out on the gray level design image, so that the accuracy of determining the enhancement coefficient corresponding to the pixel point in the gray level design image can be improved, the number of pseudo edges in the enhanced gray level design image can be reduced, and the image enhancement effect is improved.

column12: Digital performance SaaS system based on 5G technology
column13: The invention discloses a digital performance SaaS system based on a 5G technology. The system comprises an SaaS user side, an SaaS cloud server, an SaaS cloud database, a cloud 5G communication module and a plurality of SaaS performance design modules. The SaaS performance design module is used for generating theater recording and broadcasting data or theater live broadcasting data and uploading the theater recording and broadcasting data or theater live broadcasting data to the SaaS cloud database through the 5G communication module; the SaaS user side is used for initiating a watching service request to the SaaS cloud server through the cloud 5G communication module; the SaaS cloud server is used for calling recorded broadcast data or live broadcast data from the SaaS cloud resource library according to the watching service request and feeding back the recorded broadcast data or the live broadcast data to the SaaS user side through the cloud 5G communication module; according to the system and the method, the performance finished products are concentrated on the SaaS cloud to be displayed, the watching service is provided for the user, rapid uploading and downloading of data are realized through the 5G communication technology, and better watching experience is provided for the user.

column12: Semiconductor fabrication design rule loophole checking for design for manufacturability optimization
column13: Technical solutions are described for fabricating a semiconductor wafer. An example method includes generating a process assumption band for an element of the wafer. The process assumption band depicts a shape of the element based on a set of process variations in a photolithographic process used for fabricating the wafer. The method also includes generating a process variation band for the element of the wafer based on optical process correction simulation of the photolithographic process using design rules associated with the wafer. The method also includes determining a deviation between the process assumption band and the process variation band, and recalculating one or more design rules from the design rules associated with the wafer based on the deviation. The method also includes updating the design of the wafer in response to the process variation band not being changeable to match the process assumption band, after recalculating the design rules.

column12: Construction method of flexible partial repeat code based on U-shaped design
column13: The invention discloses a construction method of a flexible partial repeat code based on U-shaped design. Firstly, an original file M is divided into k original data blocks; (n, k) system MDS codes are adopted for encoding k original data blocks, related parameters are selected according to the number of encoding blocks, a U-shaped design table is constructed, an n * m matrix is obtained, and if elements in the same column take the same level, the elements are placed in a block, and a data node is formed. If the U-type design table is an equal-level design table, the constructed FR code is isomorphic, and if the U-type design table is a mixed-level design table, the constructed FR code is heterogeneous. According to the method, FR code construction is simpler and more visual, and isomorphic and heterogeneous FR codes can be constructed by adjusting parameters of the U-shaped design table.

column12: Performance design method for glove box of dashboard of passenger car
column13: The invention relates to a passenger car instrument panel glove box performance design method, which comprises the steps of geometric data inspection, finite element model grid division, grid quality inspection and model connection, material and attribute endowing, constraint mode solving, glove box closing state middle position rigidity strength analysis and glove box opening state middle position rigidity strength analysis. Left and right side rigidity strength analysis of the glove box in an open state, simulation result evaluation, and glove box performance optimization. The method can predict whether the performance of the glove box meets the requirements under the condition of misoperation or extreme use in the product design stage, optimizes the structure which does not meet the target requirements, effectively improves the development efficiency of the instrument board glove box, shortens the development period, improves the one-time design success rate of the product, forms the forward development capability of the instrument board glove box, and improves the development efficiency of the instrument board glove box. The cost of reopening a mold caused by disqualification of the glove box is reduced, the development time and cost of the instrument board glove box product are reduced, and the digital intelligent development of the instrument board glove box assembly product is realized.

column12: DESIGN SPACE EXPLORATION WITH BAYESIAN INFERENCE
column13: A system, a computer program product, and method for physically fabricating an electronic circuit using design space exploration as part of a design process is described. The method begins with defining a plurality of design space parameters to be tuned along with parameter ranges for each of the plurality of design space parameters. Next an output target to be optimized is defined. A series of one or more test mask shapes are generated to appear on a photo mask using the plurality of design space parameters. A simulation of a post lithography or etch on the series of one or more test mask shapes is performed to produce simulation output values. Next, the simulation output values and corresponding design space parameters are fed into to a Bayesian inference algorithm for assessment and identification of a next combination of design space parameters to investigate.

column12: MEASUREMENT AND ANALYSIS SYSTEM OF CHILDREN'S PHYSICAL FITNESS WITH GAMIFICATION AND SCAMMON GROWTH CURVES
column13: The present invention relates to a system for measuring and analyzing child health and physical fitness with gamification and scammon growth curves capable of forming good habits for the child health through a coordination process with a sensory function of a human body when acquiring physical skills necessary for physical development in basic physical fitness to support growth development of a child and skillfully performing technical moves. By applying the scammon growth curves of a child standard develop process based on a theory of a physical activity promotion system (PAPS) for measuring accurate physical fitness of the child, the present invention measures six types of health and fitness of cardiopulmonary endurance, muscular endurance, flexibility (space perception), agility (audible response), coordination (switching), and balance (equilibrium); and analyzes whether proper physical development is shown depending on a child age and a human body development stage. Therefore, the present invention presents a customized result for each child and provides a solution.

column12: POWER ALLOCATION USING MULTIPLE VOLTAGE DOMAINS FOR PROGRAMMABLE LOGIC DEVICES
column13: An integrated circuit device (26) that includes programmable logic circuitry that includes a plurality of regions (30A-30D) each configured to operate at different voltage levels. The regions may be separated by level shifters (32) that enable communication between the different voltage level regions. The integrated circuity may also include software that performs voltage aware placement and routing for a user register-transfer level design, and may direct logic to regions according to voltages defined for the regions.

column12: ORTHOPEDIC REPAIR SCAFFOLD, PREPARATION METHOD THEREOF AND USE THEREOF
column13: Provided are an orthopedic repair scaffold, a preparation method thereof and use thereof. The orthopedic repair scaffold is a three-dimensional porous scaffold. A material of the orthopedic repair scaffold comprises the following components in mass percentage: 80%-95% of a biodegradable polymer and 5%-20% of a biodegradable nanoparticle, where the biodegradable nanoparticle is a nanoparticle of manganese compound. The preparation method of the orthopedic repair scaffold comprises: preparing a homogeneous solution comprising a biodegradable polymer and a biodegradable nanoparticle according to the mass percentage; preparing the homogeneous solution through a curing molding process into a molded three-dimensional porous scaffold; and freeze-drying the molded three-dimensional porous scaffold to obtain the orthopedic repair scaffold. The orthopedic repair scaffold can better promote healing of a bone injury and has an excellent mechanical performance and a good medical imaging function.

column12: Method for optimizing linear parameters of flat and vertical sections of suspension type monorail line
column13: The invention provides a suspension type monorail line flat and vertical section linear parameter optimization method, which can realize evaluation and optimization of dynamic performance of a suspension type monorail vehicle under different line conditions, and solves the problem that a vehicle system and a line system are mutually adaptive and matched in dynamic performance design. Relates to the technical field of rail transit. A suspension type monorail line flat and vertical section linear parameter optimization method comprises the steps that a V-S curve obtained through calculation of a suspension type monorail train traction simulation calculation model serves as a basic input parameter, and the basic input parameter is introduced into an established suspension type monorail train-line-bridge coupling power simulation analysis model; a train operation simulation analysis system integrating traction, braking and train-line-bridge dynamic performance is constructed, and a relational database between line technical parameters and evaluation index systems, which focuses on a train-rail dynamic response evaluation method, a line shape comfort evaluation method and a bridge dynamic characteristic evaluation method, is established. The design efficiency can be improved.

column12: Robot state processing method and device, computing equipment and storage medium
column13: The embodiment of the invention discloses a robot state processing method and device, computing equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises steps of obtaining the structural data of a robot and the action configuration data of the robot; generating an initial limb state animation of the robot by utilizing the robot structure data and the action configuration data; and adjusting the initial limb state animation according to a visual transformation relationship between the real limb state of the robot and a simulated limb state of the robot on a computing device interface to obtain a target limb state animation, and displaying the target limb state animation, the visual transformation relationship being used for describing a display difference between the real limb state and the simulated limb state. According to the method, in the design and development process of the robot, labor cost can be reduced, the visual difference between the simulated robot limb state displayed on thecomputing equipment interface and the actual limb state of the robot is reduced, and the performance design effect of the robot is improved.
