column12: Semiconductor multi-physical effect simulation method based on hybrid discontinuous finite element
column13: The invention discloses a semiconductor multi-physical effect simulation method based on a hybrid discontinuous finite element. According to the method, firstly, mesh generation based on tetrahedral units is adopted for a 2D/3D semiconductor device, and a high-order basis function is constructed; then, decoupling a drift-diffusion equation system of carriers in the device structure, and splitting the drift-diffusion equation system into a nonlinear Poisson equation and a linearized drift-diffusion equation set; thirdly, performing numerical discretization on the two equations respectively by adopting a hybridizable discontinuous Galerkin HDG method; and describing a flux item in the equation by adopting a stability parameter, and solving by applying a Gummel iteration method to obtain information such as carrier concentration, potential and electric field distribution in the device. The method has the advantages of supporting any high-order basis function, being high in numerical precision, good in numerical stability, supporting large-scale parallelism and the like. The method can be used for high-efficiency and high-precision numerical calculation of the physical effect in a complex semiconductor device structure, and is used for high-performance design optimization of radio frequency, microwave and millimeter wave integrated circuits.

column12: Engine hood jitter simulation analysis method based on air pressure load
column13: The invention discloses an engine hood jitter simulation analysis method based on an air pressure load. A model is built based on finite element calculation software; an accurate finite element modelof the automobile engine hood is established; air pressure distribution of the inner side and the outer side of an engine hood outer plate is extracted; the unit pressure is projected on all units ofthe engine hood outer plate in a unit pressure mapping manner; the air pressure load is used as the air pressure load of the engine hood jitter simulation analysis, the operation accuracy of the modelis greatly improved, the experiment result can be accurately predicted, whether the engine hood meets the jitter performance design requirement or not is judged, the cost of a sample vehicle is saved, and the research and development efficiency of the vehicle is greatly improved. By the adoption of the engine hood jitter simulation analysis method based on the air pressure load, various engine hood design schemes can be verified efficiently with low cost through a finite element simulation method, and therefore various virtual schemes can be optimized.

column12: Performance calculation method for variable-aperture grid ion thruster
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of space electric propulsion, in particular to a variable-aperture grid ion thruster performance calculation method, which comprises the following steps of: 1, performing region division on a screen grid; 2, determining beam ion density distribution corresponding to each region; step 3, selecting a gate hole as a research object; 4, calculating to obtain the upstream ion density of the screen grid of each area; 5, calculating the number of ions entering the grid calculation area in each time step length; step 6, performing simulation by adopting a simulation calculation method; 7, calculating to obtain a total extraction beam after thruster beam extraction in each area reaches a steady state; and step 8, obtaining a total extraction beam of the thruster. According to the method, the performance of the whole thruster is quickly predicted by using a numerical simulation calculation method, the maximum extraction beam of the thruster under a rated working condition and a specific geometric structure is analyzed, and whether the result meets the performance design requirement of the thruster or not is judged.

column12: Interaction equipment and control system of electric kart
column13: The invention relates to an interaction device and a control system of an electric kart, and the interaction device comprises a positioning generator which is used for transmitting a positioning signal and comprises a positioning chip based on an ultra wide band, an infrared emitter and an infrared sensor; an input controller for user operation including a conversion medium that converts an operation of the vehicle into an electrical signal; the display equipment is used for displaying images, animations and videos; the sound equipment is used for playing sound; the light equipment is used for lighting and displaying a light-emitting effect; and the master control processor is used for communicating with the server and processing the instruction so as to drive the kart motor and the interaction equipment. According to the invention, based on the interactive operation and active identification technology of the user, speed control, start-stop management and other dynamic performance control functions of the electric kart are realized, and gamification experience is provided for consumers on the basis of traditional kart driving experience, so that consumer groups are widened, sales conversion and re-purchase are improved, and the market competitiveness of the electric kart is improved. And the operation of operators is facilitated.

column12: Real vehicle driving scene synchronous gamification method, controller and vehicle
column13: The invention discloses a real vehicle driving scene synchronous gamification method, a controller and a vehicle. The method is applied to a controller of an automobile, the controller communicates with a display device, and the method comprises the steps that an input control instruction is obtained; determining simulation driving parameters of the simulation automobile model according to the control instruction; acquiring actual driving parameters and external images of the real vehicle at the current moment; performing scene reconstruction based on the actual driving parameters and the external image to obtain a world model corresponding to the current scene and a plurality of game interaction models; based on composition logic of the world model, fusing the plurality of game interaction models and the simulation automobile model to generate a game scene corresponding to the current moment; and controlling the display device to render and display the game scene. According to the method, the real vehicle driving scene is reconstructed into the game scene in real time, and the display picture is updated and displayed in combination with the input control instruction, so that a user can perform driving simulation in combination with the real driving scene, and the real-time performance of scene updating is realized.

column12: TCMS-RIOM control unit with safety level design
column13: The invention relates to a TCMS-RIOM control unit, in particular to a TCMS-RIOM control unit with a safety level design. The current situation that the safety and reliability of an existing TCMS-RIOMcontrol unit need to be improved is solved. The TCMS-RIOM control unit designs a channel according to EN50126 and EN50129 series standards, and the channel has a periodic self-checking function. The TCMS-RIOM control unit with the safety level design comprises a main control board card, a network board card, a digital quantity input board card, a digital quantity output board card, an analog quantity input and output board card and a backboard. The main control board card and the network board card perform data interaction through a CPCI board-level bus on the backboard, and the network boardcard performs data interaction with the digital quantity input board card, the digital quantity output board card and the analog quantity input and output board card through a CAN bus on the backboard; the safety design comprises DI/DO safety loop design and AIO safety loop design.

column12: METHOD FOR VERIFYING ESTIMATED WEIGHT OF SHIP USING DESIGN DATA
column13: The present invention provides a method capable of checking an exact ship body weight and verifying an estimated ship body weight at a design step before an actual ship is manufactured. The method, in the present invention, comprises: a first step of inputting an estimated ship body weight by a ship type and a ship size; a second step of allowing each block constituting the ship body to be prepared as 3D design data wherein a plurality of members are disposed with a welding gap to each other; and a third step of verifying the estimated ship body weight by generating welding information using the 3D design data and calculating the ship body design weight by adding up the weights of all the welding parts according to the welding information and all the members of the 3D design data.

column12: Method and system for music and dance recommendations
column13: A method and system that includes at least one processor, the at least one computer in communication with at least one data storage unit, the at least one computer programmed and/or configured to: generate a plurality of dance sequences; associate or cause the association of each of the plurality of dance sequences with at least one dance corpus classification; generate, for each of the plurality of users, a user profile; receive, from each of the plurality of users, at least one preference data; associate or causing the association of each of the user's profile with at least one preference data; and generate a recommendation of a dance sequence for each of the plurality of users.

column12: Game level design method and device, storage medium and electronic equipment
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of game development, and provides a game level design method and device, a storage medium and electronic equipment. The game level design method comprisesthe following steps: converting an emotion experience curve of a player for a game level to obtain a target function; configuring a game level; training an intelligent agent for the game level and trying to play the game level by utilizing the intelligent agent; recording game data generated in the trial playing process and determining the actual function of the game level according to the game data; calculating the difference between the actual function and the target function of the game level; and determining final configuration information of the game level according to the difference. According to the method, the trained intelligent agent is used for replacing a human player to try to play the game level, so that the manpower and time cost required for designing the game level can begreatly saved. Moreover, the game level can be comprehensively tested by utilizing the intelligent agent, so that the designed game level can be accurately matched with a preset player emotion experience curve, and the game experience of the player is improved.

column32: 柴阁: "动作冒险类游戏关卡设计浅析", 《艺术科技》

column12: TARGET PROGRAM TESTING METHOD AND APPARATUS, AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column13: A target program testing method and apparatus, and a device and a storage medium. The method comprises: displaying a user interface of a simulator, wherein the simulator loads a target program, and the user interface displays a program page of the target program (302); in response to an enable operation of an accessible mode, enabling the accessible mode in the simulator (304); and in the accessible mode, displaying accessible design information on a page element in the program page of the target program (306). In the present application, a target program does not need to be run on a real user terminal, and an accessibility test can be directly realized on a simulator in a visual manner.

column12: FIRE RESISTANCE AND FIRE PROTECTION PERFORMANCE DESIGN SYSTEM AT PLANT FACILITY DESIGN STAGE
column13: The present invention relates to a fire resistance and fire protection performance design system at a plant facility design stage to conduct specification and performance methods of safety and fire-resistance structures of major plant structures according to the characteristics and risk characteristics of the plant production process and conduct integrated risk management of plant facilities through the design of firefighting facilities for efficient fire control in the event of a fire. To this end, the fire resistance and fire protection performance design system at a plant facility design stage according to the invention includes: a terminal for an administrator accessing the system from a remote location through a wired/wireless Internet network; and a design system in which the design of fire resistance and fire protection functions for predetermined plant facilities is performed while connected to the Internet network, and the design system includes: an operation server for performing protocol and data processing between a terminal for an administrator connected through the Internet network and a corresponding system; and a database server in which predetermined data for identification of an object for a design target and selection of a design method are stored after identifying the types of plant facilities for the design of fire protection and fire protection functions.

column12: Method for generating a tool path to manufacture a part using a computer numerical control machine system
column13: A method for generating a tool path to manufacture a part using a computer numerical control system includes the steps of; generating an initial design part geometry from a geometry modelling program as an input, creating a pre-finished in-process workpiece geometry before a finishing process, controlling a stock thickness distribution of the pre-finished in-process workpiece geometry by following the tool path, wherein the stock thickness distribution is based on at least one ruling function on a basis of at least one predetermined direction, wherein the at least one ruling function is used to determine a stock thickness at a tool location to obtain a variable stock thickness distribution around a design part; locating at least one tool to be defined with respect to the initial design part geometry.

column12: User dominant network data analysis system based on capability opening and analysis method thereof
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of communication, and discloses a user dominant network data analysis system based on capability opening and an analysis method thereof. According to the invention, in combination with new characteristics of the 5G network, NWDAF, user data analysis, user service data, computing power resources of an operator cloud data center, opening capability and an algorithm model library are subjected to system-level design and application, the data analysis experience of the user based on the 5G network is improved, and the service quality of the service is enhanced. In addition, the main right of data analysis is handed over to the user, comprehensive training is carried out through the capability opening service platform in combination with service data of the user side, one-stop data analysis service is achieved, the service analysis requirement is met through capability opening, and meanwhile the problems of data safety and the like caused by data relocation are reduced.

column12: Engineering infant skull shaping accompanying pillow
column13: The utility model discloses an ergonomic infant skull shaping accompanying pillow, belongs to the technical field of infant supplies, and solves the problems that an existing device cannot meet the requirement of rapid growth and development of infants and is short in service life compared with an adult pillow. The pillow is technically characterized in that the pillow comprises a main body, sidepillow bodies and a central pillow body are arranged on the main body, the central pillow body is a spherical pillow disc, the central pillow body is arranged in the center of the main body, the sidepillow bodies are symmetrically arranged relative to the central pillow body, and an auxiliary assembly with an AI function is arranged in an inner cavity of the main body; according to the embodimentof the utility model, through the cooperative work of the two-way use design of the side pillow bodies and the central pillow body, the head shaping accompanying pillow for the engineering baby meetsthe biological requirements in the rapid growth and development process of the baby, and meanwhile, the service life of the head shaping accompanying pillow for the engineering baby is prolonged.

column12: HYBRID OUT OF CONTEXT HIERARCHICAL DESIGN FLOW FOR HIERARCHICAL TIMING CONVERGENCE OF INTEGRATED CIRCUITS FOR OUT OF CONTEXT SIGNOFF ANALYSIS
column13: A computer-implemented method for a hierarchical design flow for deterministic or statistical timing convergence of VLSI circuits enabling design reuse, concurrency and out of context signoff analysis includes: defining, by a computing device, component clock definitions; performing static timing analysis on a lower level component of a circuit design; performing a timing closure for the lower level component based on performing the static timing analysis; generating a timing abstract associated with the lower level component; performing static timing analysis on a higher level component of the circuit design using the timing abstract and the results of the out-of-context timing analysis of the lower level component; generating smart guidance assertions based on performing the static timing analysis on the higher level component; and storing the smart guidance assertions for performing a subsequent timing analysis on the lower level component.

column12: DESIGN APPARATUS
column13: To provide a design apparatus capable of highly-accurately obtaining optimal values for design specifications relating to ribs of a structure of a facility machine having rib structure by obtaining estimated values representing stiffness of the structure in a further highly-accurate manner, regarding the structure.SOLUTION: A design apparatus 2 for designing a structure of a facility machine having a rib structure comprises: a model storage unit 96 which stores a trained model generated by machine learning with first power values and higher order multiplier values of thicknesses Ta and Tb of ribs 71 to 76 and 81 to 84 as explanatory variables and values representing stiffness of the structure as objective variables; a stiffness estimation unit 99 which outputs estimated values representing the stiffness of the structure in the facility machine by inputting the explanatory variables generated using design specifications to be considered into the trained model; and an optimal value determination unit 100 which determines optimal values for the design specifications relating to the ribs 71 to 76 and 81 to 84 of the structure based on the estimated values representing the stiffness.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 4

column12: Seismic data acquisition using designed non-uniform receiver spacing
column13: The presently disclosed technology relates to an arrangement for seismic acquisition where the spacing between adjacent pairs of receiver and sources lines is not all the same. Some receiver and/or source lines and/or receiver and/or source spacings are larger and some are smaller to provide a higher quality wavefield reconstruction when covering a larger total area or for a similar total area of seismic data acquisition, while providing a wavefield that is optimally sampled by the receivers and sources so that the wavefield reconstruction is suitable for subsurface imaging needs.

column12: Design process standardized parameter driving device
column13: The invention discloses a design process standardization parameter driving device which comprises: a parameter-level principle design object modeling device which is used for constructing and expressing a principle design object of a product so as to manage performance design process data of the whole engine and each component/subsystem and related design scheme data; and a structural design object manager which is associated with the parameter-level principle design object modeler and is used for constructing and expressing a structural design object of the product so as to manage a three-dimensional structural scheme model and structural analysis simulation process data of the engine. According to the design process standardization parameter driving device, an engine product object can be established and an index parameter system of the engine product object can be accommodated on the basis of a parameter-level abstract modeling technology, and a data management framework suitable for a specific engine development project is formed; a support index parameter system provides technical support for continuous improvement, multi-specialty collaborative design, identification and management of design process data and the like in the research and development process.

column12: Modeling method for simulation analysis of vehicle door sealing strip
column13: The invention discloses a modeling method for simulation analysis of a vehicle door sealing strip, and the method comprises the following steps: 1, data establishment: a worker establishes conceptualized or specific detailed-stage envelope geometric data for the sealing strip; step 2, data processing: performing geometric cleaning on geometric data by a worker; step 3, curve establishment: a worker establishes curve geometry on a starting line through con2curv, and the curves are merged through Connnect-Multi; according to the method, a CAE technology is utilized to analyze the sealing strip, the sealing strip is subjected to joint modeling processing by adopting connector-shell, connector is responsible for simulating compression force, a large-size shell unit is responsible for contact behaviors, the method solves the problem of calculation efficiency, meanwhile, the calculation efficiency of the sealing strip is greatly improved, and meanwhile, the sealing strip is subjected to joint modeling processing by adopting the CAE technology. The sealing property of any area can be quickly defined, the sealing performance of the sealing strip can be accurately evaluated, and the method is a powerful means in forward performance design.

column12: PATH TEACHING DATA CREATION DEVICE, PATH TEACHING DATA CREATION METHOD, AND PROGRAM
column13: An object is to reduce user burden. A path teaching data creation device 1 includes: a selection unit 24 configured to select, as a connection target curve, at least one further curve connected to an end point of a connection source curve that is a curve from which a connection is started, determine the selected further curve as the next connection source curve, and sequentially select a curve to be the connection target curve; and a path creation unit 25 configured to create the path teaching data based on the curves selected by the selection unit 24. When a plurality of further curves connected to the end point of the connection source curve are present, the selection unit 24 selects one of the further curves as the connection target curve based on a final tangent direction of the connection source curve and respective start tangent directions of the further curves.

column12: CONTROLLING TEST NETWORKS OF CHIPS USING INTEGRATED PROCESSORS
column13: The disclosure provides using test processors to provide a more flexible solution compared to the existing DFX blocks that are used for controlling test networks in chips. The test processors provide a highly flexible solution since programming of the test processors can be changed at any time; even after manufacturing, and can support practically an unlimited number of core chips in any configuration. The high flexibility provided via the test processors can reduce engineering effort needed in design and verification, accelerate schedules, and may prevent additional tapeouts in case of DFX design bugs. By making debug and diagnosis easier by providing an opportunity to change debug behavior as needed, the time-to-market timeline can be accelerated. Accordingly, the disclosure provides a chip with a test processor, a multi-chip processing system with a test processor, and a method of designing a chip having a test processor.

column12: Data visualization large-screen display system supporting dynamic customization
column13: The invention discloses a data visualization large-screen display system supporting dynamic customization. The data visualization large-screen display system comprises a data acquisition module, a database module, a data analysis module, a visualization component module, a large-screen interface preset interaction module, a wireless communication module and a cloud platform module. Different desensitization rules are formulated for data of different sensitivity levels through the data desensitization module, and sensitive data outflow during data transmission is prevented through data desensitization technology processing such as masking, rewriting and encryption, so that the security during data transmission is greatly improved; meanwhile, the large-screen interface preset interaction module raises a traditional interface design to a behavior level design, the use evaluation of the data visualization large-screen display system supporting dynamic customization is improved, and a used data chart can be conveniently shared through a cloud platform through the cloud platform module; and the use efficiency of the existing data visualization large-screen display system in different scenes is greatly improved.

column12: Steel rail flaw detection simulation learning practical training instrument, training system platform and practical training method
column13: The invention discloses a steel rail flaw detection simulation learning practical training instrument, a training system platform and a practical training method, which arebased on computer integration reproduction technology of existing steel rail flaw waveform map information and the like and behavior simulation research of steel rail flaw detection operation operators, and achieve the purposes of guiding flaw detection operators to stand a post, autonomously and efficiently improving service skills, and performing double cultivation of skills and responsibility, enhancing the steel rail flaw detection practical operation experience of the operators and rapidly improving the flaw detection analysis and judgment capability of the flaw detection operators; and the training instrument is practical training technical equipment integrating fragmentization, gamification and immersion type learning concepts. On one hand, a large number of standard practical training materials are provided for practical training organizers, and training courses are creatively customized to achieve training intentions; and on the other hand, an autonomous learning environment is provided for practical trainees, skill training is efficiently completed, operation standard execution is strictly performed, the purpose of comprehensively improving occupational literacy of trainees is achieved, and the training instrument has popularization value in the aspect of rapid training of flaw detection skill talents.

column12: OROFACIAL MYOFUNCTIONAL THERAPY METHODS AND SYSTEMS
column13: Described herein are methods and systems for using orofacial myofunctional therapy to non-surgically treat orofacial muscle disorders (OMDs) in a patient. The methods and systems combine orofacial myofunctional therapy exercises with an oral appliance. The methods and systems may include a three-phase orofacial myofunctional therapy program that can vary in length depending on patient diagnosis and evaluation by a healthcare professional.

column12: Game type core stability rehabilitation training system
column13: The invention discloses a game type core stability rehabilitation training system. A core stability rehabilitation mechanism, a human body protection mechanism, a traction weight reduction mechanism and a man-machine interaction mechanism are arranged in a training room; the core stable rehabilitation mechanism is structurally characterized in that a swing plate controlled by a range of motion limiter and a balance sensor is mounted in the middle of an indoor bottom plate through an arranged base; the human body protection mechanism arranged by taking the swing plate as the center is structurally an annular waist limiting frame with an opening closed through a telescopic rod, and is fixedly connected to the bottom plate through supporting legs; and the structure of the traction weight reduction mechanism is a traction weight reduction box which is fixedly arranged above the human body protection mechanism, a hanging belt which is driven by a motor and controlled by a ratchet wheel is arranged in the traction weight reduction box, and the hanging belt is used for hanging traction clothes. The rehabilitation training system is reasonable in structure and safe and reliable in performance, rehabilitation training items can be selected more selectively, the enthusiasm and compliance of treatment of patients can be greatly improved through the interestingness of multi-element gamification training, and the work intensity of therapists and social medical burden can be effectively reduced through a simple control design.

column12: Carbon emission data processing method based on block chain
column13: The invention discloses a carbon emission data processing method based on a block chain, relates to the technical field of carbon emission, and aims to solve the problems that data processing of carbon emission is not perfect at present, so that a user cannot better know the specific condition of the carbon emission, and corresponding processing measures cannot be taken on the carbon emission exceeding the standard. Comprising application level design, public service design, data model design, data submission block chain design, data model calculation, data uplink submission and data verification, and in the design of carbon emission data, the data modeling process is standardized according to a CCER methodology model or a CEA accounting guide model. According to the carbon emission data processing method based on the block chain, the carbon emission of each power plant can be automatically calculated, so that a user can understand the carbon emission condition of each large enterprise in a replaceable manner, corresponding measures can be conveniently taken for the enterprise with the carbon emission exceeding the standard, the labor intensity of workers is reduced, and the working efficiency is improved.
column14: SHANGHAI QIQUN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD

column12: Operation and maintenance process management performance optimization method of early warning system
column13: The invention discloses an operation and maintenance process management performance optimization method of an early warning system, which can realize comprehensive performance optimization design of an information safety operation monitoring and early warning system from two aspects of data interaction and application response and three levels of software, hardware and network; aiming at the optimization of data interaction and the optimization of the operation, the method achieves the optimization mainly from the aspects of high-performance technology application, database optimization, structural performance optimization, data generalization, adoption of a multi-thread technology, data compression and transmission, data caching, data access optimization and multi-level performance guarantee optimization, so user operation can be responded in time during large-data-volume interaction, and the performance requirement of a system is met; in the aspect of application response, optimization is considered in the aspects of UI response optimization, programming language selection, code performance design, unnecessary request reduction and interface element compression, and the high performance of the system is ensured.

column12: Processor system, starting method and computing equipment
column13: The invention provides a processor system, a starting method and computing equipment, and the processor system comprises a first processor wafer which is used for loading a starting code from an external memory and starting the first processor wafer based on the starting code; and the second processor wafer is electrically connected with the first processor wafer through a first interface so as to form a data transmission channel, and the data transmission channel is used for receiving the starting code from the first processor wafer so as to start the second processor wafer. In the embodiment of the invention, the data channels among the plurality of processor wafers are constructed to transmit the startup codes, so that the processor system can start the plurality of processor wafers through one external memory, the number of the external memories in the multi-wafer processor system is reduced, and the problem of complex board-level design can be solved.

column12: Aero-engine compressor disc temperature prediction method based on multi-layer perceptron
column13: The invention discloses an aero-engine compressor disc temperature prediction method based on a multilayer perceptron. The aero-engine compressor disc temperature prediction method comprises the steps that engine compressor disc performance design data is obtained, multi-working-condition calculation is conducted on a finite element model, sample space data is formed, and invalid value elimination or normalization processing is conducted on the sample space data; dividing the sample space data into a training set and a test set, taking data of a first proportion in the sample space data as the training set, and taking data of a second proportion as the test set; the value of the first proportion is greater than that of the second proportion; a model is established according to data of the training set, and parameters of the established model are optimized through grid search; and inputting data of a test set into the model to obtain a gas compressor disc temperature prediction result corresponding to the test set, and comparing the gas compressor disc temperature prediction result with a real disc center temperature value iteratively calculated by a traditional finite element method. The method is high in calculation precision, high in calculation speed and high in applicability.
column15: WANG XUEMIN;;XU JINGPEI;;HE YUN;;WANG MEI;;SHEN XIAOWEI

column12: Method and application of rapidly finding effective components in traditional Chinese medicine compound prescription
column13: The invention discloses a method and an application of rapidly finding effective components in traditional Chinese medicine compound prescription. The method is a process for rapidly finding the effective components in the traditional Chinese medicine compound prescription on the basis of two-factor level design-support vector machine (2-LFD-SVM), wherein through the two-factor level design 2-LFDscreening process, multi-level and multi-factor compatibility combination is carried out and corresponding pharmacodynamics indices are acquired through pharmacodynamics tests; with combination of main component content data, support vector machine (SVM) algorithm is used to achieve multi-efficacy-target optimization for the compatibility combination of all effective components. The method achieves the objects of optimizing extraction methods, refining extraction parts and purifying effective components. As a key common technology of digital extraction of traditional Chinese medicine, the effective components in traditional Chinese medicine compound prescription are rapidly found, which is beneficial to increase of development progress of new formulas. The method and application provides ademonstration for finding the effective components in traditional Chinese medicine compound prescription and developing the new formulas, and has excellent application prospects.

column12: Maintenance protocol message transceiving method based on hardware simulation accelerator
column13: The invention relates to a maintenance protocol message transceiving method based on a hardware simulation accelerator. The method comprises the following steps that in a chip RTL-level design verification environment, a maintenance interface intermediate module internally provided with various maintenance commands and response format checking mechanisms according to a maintenance interface protocol is additionally arranged, and the maintenance interface intermediate module comprises a first auxiliary memory and a second auxiliary memory; in the running process of the chip, the maintenance interface intermediate module monitors the first auxiliary memory, once it is found that the content in the first auxiliary memory is not empty, the content in the first auxiliary memory is read out, andthe content is analyzed through a maintenance command format checking mechanism; after a maintenance command is sent to the chip port, the maintenance interface intermediate module monitors the serial output port of the chip, and once response data exists, a response format checking mechanism of the maintenance interface intermediate module analyzes the response data. According to the invention,efficient transceiving of the maintenance protocol data message based on the hardware simulation accelerator can be realized.
column14: SHANGHAI HIGH PERFORMANCE INTEGRATED CIRCUIT DESIGN CENTER

column12: Aircraft dynamic RCS simulation method for air route flight process
column13: The invention discloses an aircraft dynamic RCS simulation method for an air route flight process, and relates to the technical field of simulation and radar detection, and the method comprises the following steps: building a six-degree-of-freedom dynamic model and a control law of an aircraft according to various parameter data of a to-be-simulated aircraft, and simulating a flight air route of the aircraft to obtain flight air route simulation data; according to the flight route simulation data of the aircraft, establishing a calculation model of the azimuth angle and the elevation angle of the radar relative to the aircraft based on the sight angle range of the aircraft body system; calculating the RCS of the aircraft under different flight attitudes, and establishing a dynamic RCS library; and according to the latitude longitude height of the waypoint of the aircraft and the latitude longitude height of the radar, simulating the six-degree-of-freedom flight path of the aircraft by using the dynamic RCS library, and calculating a dynamic RCS simulation value of the aircraft. According to the method, the dynamic RCS of the whole air route flight process of the aircraft is analyzed, and certain theoretical support is provided for aircraft stealth performance design and test evaluation.
column15: XU WENFENG;;PEI BINBIN;;LI YINGHUI;;XU HAOJUN;;LI YIWEN;;YU ZHILONG

column12: METHODS AND SYSTEMS FOR DETECTING REPEATING DEFECTS ON SEMICONDUCTOR WAFERS USING DESIGN DATA
column13: Systems and methods for detecting defects on a wafer are provided. One method includes determining locations of all instances of a weak geometry in a design for a wafer. The locations include random, aperiodic locations. The weak geometry includes one or more features that are more prone to defects than other features in the design. The method also includes scanning the wafer with a wafer inspection system to thereby generate output for the wafer with one or more detectors of the wafer inspection system. In addition, the method includes detecting defects in at least one instance of the weak geometry based on the output generated at two or more instances of the weak geometry in a single die on the wafer.

column12: IMPLEMENTING AND VERIFYING SAFETY MEASURES IN A SYSTEM DESIGN BASED ON SAFETY SPECIFICATION GENERATED FROM SAFETY REQUIREMENTS
column13: A system enhances a system design to incorporate safety measures. The system receives a system design for processing through various stages of design using design tools, for example electronic design automation tools for introducing safety features in a circuit design. The system receives safety requirements for the system design, the safety requirements specifying safety measures for the system design. The system generates from the safety requirements, a safety specification storing a set of commands. The system generates a system design enhanced with safety measures. The enhanced system design it generated for at least a subset of the plurality of tools. A tool processes the generated safety specification to implement safety measures in the system design according to the received safety requirements.

column12: Matching method of coverage object in verification plan, storage medium and electronic equipment
column13: The invention relates to the field of chip verification, in particular to a matching method for coverage objects in a verification plan, a storage medium and electronic equipment, which comprises the following steps: creating an index database for different levels designed by a user, and extracting all region expressions in the verification plan; generating a data matching mode according to the region expression, wherein the matching mode comprises basic information of a coverage object and matching conditions of different levels; according to the name of the coverage object and the type of the coverage object, the unique identification id of all the coverage objects meeting the matching condition is searched in the index database, the coverage rate data is obtained through the unique identification id of the coverage object, and the coverage object can be quickly found in the user design according to the area expression specified by the user.

column12: Collaboration tool for healthcare providers
column13: A device may communicate with a first device to receive first data. The device may communicate with a second device to receive second data. The device may combine the first data and the second data into a user interface. The user interface may provide a single location for displaying communications with the set of entities and with a system associated with the set of entities. The user interface may include a first section that provides information that is persistently presented in the user interface. The user interface may include a second section that provides information that is selectively presented in the user interface. The device may provide the user interface for display.

column12: ELECTRODE ORIENTATION CHECKING APPARATUS AND ELECTRODE ORIENTATION CHECKING METHOD
column13: An electrode orientation checking apparatus includes a machine stand attached to a seam welding apparatus from which one roller electrode of a set has been removed, a positioning guide and a set of distance sensors that are provided on the machine stand, and a calculating section. A positioning surface of the positioning guide is fixed at a position corresponding to a portion of an outer circumferential surface of the one roller electrode before being removed, the portion lying on a line segment connecting rotational centers of the roller electrodes. The distance sensors are respectively fixed forward and backward of the positioning surface in a progression direction of the roller electrodes. The calculating section calculates data for acquiring a direction of the line segment relative to the stacked body.

column12: Ultrathin special-shaped multifunctional filter
column13: The utility model relates to an ultra-thin special-shaped multifunctional filter, and belongs to the technical field of signal processing and filtering. According to the utility model, a special-shaped shell design is adopted, so that the use requirement of a customer in a specific structural space can be met; a board-level design and a reasonable spatial layout are adopted, so that the small and ultra-thin use requirements of customers can be met; meanwhile, power EMI filtering and overvoltage protection of RS422 receiving and transmitting circuits and video transmitting CLK and DATA circuits are achieved, and the multifunctional requirement can be met.

column12: TCMS-MPU control unit with safety level design
column13: The invention relates to a TCMS-MPU control unit, in particular to a TCMS-MPU control unit with a safety level design. The problem that the safety and reliability of an existing TCMS-MPU control unitneed to be improved is solved. The TCMS-MPU control unit with the safety level design comprises a power supply board card, a main control board card, a network board card and a backboard; data interaction is carried out between the main control board card and the network board card through a CPCI board-level bus on the backboard. The power supply board card supplies power to the main control boardcard and the network board card through the backboard; the safety design comprises the steps that an MCU1 function module of the main control board card monitors a main processor CPU of the main control board card in real time, and a CPLD function module of the network board card monitors the execution condition of the network board card; according to the TCMS-MPU control unit, the requirements of EN50126 and EN50129 are met, the safety level of the control unit is improved, and dual-MPU hot standby redundancy control is achieved by designing the same master control MPU1 and slave control MPU2 through a safety loop.

column12: METHOD OF ANALYZING AND PROVIDING CONSUMER PREFERENCES FOR ACCESSORY DESIGNS USING DESIGN REGISTRATION PUBLICATION
column13: The present invention relates to a method for analyzing and providing consumer preference for an accessory design by using design registration publications which can develop a newtro accessory design that stimulates a consumer's purchase desire through the Korean Intellectual Property Office database. The method for analyzing and providing consumer preference for an accessory design by using design registration publications comprises the steps of: downloading design registration publication data for an accessory to be developed through access to a database server of the Korean Intellectual Property Office through a network; classifying the design registration publication data into previous design data and recent design data according to registration time; receiving age information of a plurality of users entering a platform, and grouping the same into a plurality of groups according to age; selecting, by the plurality of groups, a design-preferred part from the previous design data and the recent design data; and providing, by the plurality of groups, consumer preference information by age group by processing the selected part from the previous design data and the selected part from the recent design data.

column12: Anchor-frame-free instance portrait semantic analysis method
column13: The invention discloses an anchor frame-free instance portrait semantic analysis method. The method comprises the following steps: training an instance portrait semantic analysis model by utilizing a training set, wherein the instance portrait semantic analysis model comprises a feature extraction module, a figure instance detection branch and a figure instance fine-grained sensing branch; the figure instance fine-grained sensing branch comprises a detail keeping module, a human body part context coding module, a figure instance analysis module and an instance analysis result refining module; according to the method, a one-stage anchor-frame-free detector based on central point prediction is used for predicting the position of a figure instance bounding box, and an edge-guided figure instance semantic analysis module is used for identifying a portrait semantic component, so that the anchor-frame-free figure detector inherits the advantages of pixel-level design; the hyper-parameter sensitivity problem caused by generation of candidate bounding boxes can be effectively avoided; the edge-guided portrait semantic analysis module can effectively distinguish different figure instance positions and adjacent portrait semantic categories.

column12: Performance and reliability joint simulation design method for aerospace mechanical and electrical product
column13: The invention discloses a performance and reliability joint simulation design method for an aerospace mechanical and electrical product. Actual operation conditions of products can be comprehensivelycovered, weak links are fully exposed, performance design and reliability design are effectively combined, a quantitative relation between reliability indexes and key performance design parameters isestablished, design and manufacturing of the products are effectively guided, and the reliability design level of the products is fundamentally improved. According to the method, a technical approachand a method support can be provided for integrating product reliability design analysis into conventional design; a major breakthrough of a product performance and reliability combined design technology is achieved, the major basic capacity is improved, the cost is effectively reduced, the development period is shortened, the efficiency is improved, and high-level technical services are providedfor developing aerospace electromechanical products with high reliability, high precision and high performance.

column12: Constant humidity machine water replenishing device with double-liquid-level monitoring function
column13: The constant humidity machine water replenishing device comprises a water tank and a liquid level detection device, a cover plate is arranged on the upper portion of the water tank, a water injection pipe and an overflow pipe are arranged on the side face of the water tank, and the position of the overflow pipe is lower than that of the water injection pipe; the liquid level detection device comprises a low-level liquid level meter and a high-level liquid level meter, the low-level liquid level meter and the high-level liquid level meter are both arranged in the water tank, a partition plate used for separating the low-level liquid level meter from the high-level liquid level meter is arranged in the water tank, and the top of the partition plate is fixedly connected with the lower surface of the cover plate; by means of the double-liquid-level design, the liquid level in the water tank is automatically monitored, water supplementing and overflowing are conducted on the interior of the water tank through the electromagnetic valves connected with the liquid level meters, the automation degree of the constant humidity machine is improved, and the labor cost is reduced; and the partition plate is arranged to guide the water flow direction, the liquidometer failure probability can be effectively reduced, and the equipment operation stability is improved.

column12: Use design method of JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) in unity program production
column13: The invention relates to a JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) use design method in unity program production. The method comprises the following steps: step 1, designing a JSON file storage path; step 2, designing a data object and an array in each JSON file; step 3, by using a JSON file and a folder and designing the whole output data, completing the output and storage of the data; according to the method, the data medium of the revit data is expanded, and the availability degree of the building information is increased.

column12: FLOW SIMULATOR FOR GENERATING RESERVOIR MANAGEMENT WORKFLOWS AND FORECASTS BASED ON ANALYSIS OF HIGH-DIMENSIONAL PARAMETER DATA SPACE
column13: An apparatus used to generate forecasts from a high-dimensional parameter data space. The apparatus comprising a reservoir model and a flow simulator module. The reservoir model comprising a plurality input variables, output variables, and at least one algorithmic model. The input variables and output variables are generated by the flow simulator module and variables from a formation and reservoir properties database and a field production database. The flow simulator module generates the at least one algorithmic model and the output variables using at least one selected from a group comprising a full-physics flow simulator, proxy flow simulator for assisted history matching, and a proxy flow simulator for field development optimization. The full-physics flow simulator and the two proxy flow simulators generate the at least one algorithmic model using at least one selected from a group comprising the reservoir model, history matching input variables, and optimization input variables.

column12: IMAGING DEVICE, CORRECTION METHOD, AND COMPUTER PROGRAM
column13: An imaging device (100) includes: an imaging element (112) including a pixel capable of detecting a depth; an image processing unit (120) configured to detect a depth using a signal obtained from the pixel and perform processing based on the depth; and a correction data generation unit (130) configured to generate, based on the signal, a correction map for correcting image height dependency of the depth in the image processing unit (120).

column12: Robot automatic spraying production line operating system
column13: The utility model discloses a robot automatic spraying production line operating system which comprises a movable operating table, a conveying system, a robot system, a spraying system, a control system and a visual system. The conveying system, the robot system, the spraying system, the control system and the visual system are all arranged on the movable operation table, the robot system and thespraying system are arranged on one side of the conveying system, the visual system is arranged at one end of the conveying system, and the visual system is arranged at the other end of the conveyingsystem. The control system is connected with the conveying system, the robot system, the spraying system and the visual system. All the systems are coordinated and matched, and automatic workpiece conveying, workpiece position calibration, automatic workpiece spraying and real-time monitoring of the working state of the system can be achieved; in addition, the system is convenient to move, small in occupied area and convenient to repair and maintain due to the double-layer accessibility design.

column12: DCU chip and high-speed processor
column13: The invention discloses a DCU chip and a high-speed processor. The DCU chip comprises a pin area, the pin area comprises a plurality of virtual auxiliary grids which are arranged in a matrix and have the same size, the virtual auxiliary grids are rectangular, the vertexes of the virtual auxiliary grids are grid points, the DCU chip comprises a plurality of pin units, each pin unit comprises a plurality of pin groups, and each pin group comprises a plurality of data signal pins; each data signal pin is correspondingly provided with at least two first ground signal pins; each data signal pin and each first ground signal pin are independently arranged on the grid points; the grid point where each first ground signal pin is located and the grid point where the corresponding data signal pin is located are two adjacent grid points on the same virtual auxiliary grid. Through the technical scheme of the embodiment of the invention, the technical problems of large crosstalk between data signals and poor impedance continuity of a signal physical line in a chip Pin Map design are solved, and the chip performance design with low crosstalk and good impedance continuity is realized.
column14: ZHONGKE CONTROLLABLE INFORMATION IND CO LTD

column12: TDDI chip shared by SPI interface
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of TDDI chips, and particularly relates to a TDDI chip shared by SPIs (Serial Peripheral Interface), which comprises a data selector group, a touch module and a display module, and is characterized in that the touch module and the display module are respectively connected with corresponding ports of the data selector group through SPI_TP (Serial Peripheral Interface Transmission Protocol) and SPI_DP (Serial Peripheral Interface Data Protocol); the data selector group is connected with an external structure through an SPI (Serial Peripheral Interface). In a TDDI chip integrating a touch control module and a display module, the touch control module needs to use an SPI interface to interact with an external system main chip, and the system main chip downloads an application file required by work of the touch control module through the SPI interface; the display module transmits image data and control commands by using an SPI (Serial Peripheral Interface). According to the invention, the purpose of time division multiplexing of the SPI interface by the touch control module and the display module in the TDDI chip is achieved through control, so that the original function of the chip is realized. The number of connecting lines in system board-level design is reduced.

column12: X-ray inspection apparatus and X-ray inspection method
column13: An X-ray inspection apparatus includes a stage that moves an inspection object, an X-ray source, and/or an X-ray camera by driving a motor, a position detection unit that periodically obtains a position detection value of the motor, and stores the value in association with time, an imaging timing obtaining unit that stores an imaging timing at which imaging is performed by the X-ray camera in association with time, an imaging position calculation unit that calculates relative positions of the inspection object, and the X-ray source and the X-ray camera corresponding to the imaging timing using the position detection value of the motor at the imaging timing, and a reconstruction unit that performs reconstruction using image data captured by the X-ray camera and the relative positions in the image data at the imaging timing.

column12: INTEGRATED VEHICLE HEALTH MANAGEMENT SYSTEMS AND METHODS USING AN ENHANCED FAULT MODEL FOR A DIAGNOSTIC REASONER
column13: A method for vehicle fault management includes generating, for a vehicle system, a fault model including a plurality of faults using design failure mode and effect analysis information and parsing each of the faults of the plurality of faults by subsystem of the vehicle system. The method also includes determining, for a respective fault of the plurality of faults, whether the respective fault is associated with at least one existing diagnostic trouble code based on fault code requirement information. The method also includes, in response to a determination that the respective fault is associated with at least one existing diagnostic trouble code, associating, in a fault database, the at least one existing diagnostic trouble code with the respective fault.

column12: Whole vehicle cooling heat damage test method, system and test bin
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of automobile testing, in particular to a finished automobile cooling heat damage test method and system and a test bin, and the method comprises the steps: starting an engine in a test bed scene when a simulation environment of the test bin reaches test environment conditions of finished automobile cooling heat damage, and collecting the rotating speed of the engine by a rotating speed sensor in the test bed scene; according to the fact that the chassis dynamometer is located at different gradients, the rotating speed of the whole vehicle reaches a corresponding value and then is stably kept, temperature result data of test points under different industrial controls are collected, and a temperature time history chart of the test points is drawn. According to the invention, the actual cooling heat damage real environment of the whole vehicle can be simulated, and the temperature of each test point under the low-load and high-load working conditions and the running and idling state can be recorded in real time based on the environment; through the parameters, the balance process of the heat emitted by the engine and the influence of an engine cooling system on related parts when the automobile works can be analyzed, and a basis is provided for the performance design optimization of the whole automobile.
column15: FANG XINGSHENG;;JIANG QIRUI;;DING QING;;SHENG JIEYING;;JIANG XUNPENG;;WANG JUN;;XIONG WENTAO

column12: Measuring device for interior design
column13: The invention discloses a measuring device for interior design, and the device comprises: a walking chassis, which is driven by a motor to move according to a preset track; a house type size acquisition module, which is carried on the walking chassis and acquires and records the size of a house type to be measured in real time in the process of moving along with the walking chassis; a ground flatness acquisition module, which is carried on the walking chassis and is used for acquiring flatness data of the house type to be measured in real time in the moving process of the walking chassis; and a measurement image output module, which is carried on the walking chassis and generates an actual measurement image according to the house type size acquired by the house type size acquisition module and the flatness data acquired by the ground flatness acquisition module. The technical problems that in the prior art, indoor measurement efficiency is low during indoor design, and budget accuracy of ground leveling design is low are solved.

column12: Device and method for accurately testing mechanical behavior of single fiber-asphalt base material interface
column13: The invention discloses a device and a method for accurately testing mechanical behaviors of a single fiber-asphalt base material interface. The device comprises a micro-stretching system, a temperature control system, a microscopic system and a data acquisition system. The micro-stretching system is used for speed regulation, a screw rod drives a steel clamp to ascend and descend, a linear guide rail is arranged, a polyethylene patch is arranged in the steel clamp, the temperature control system can adjust the test environment temperature in the device, and the microscopic system is connected to the stand column and can be adjusted according to the position of a sample. And the data acquisition system can realize real-time recording and acquisition of tension, displacement and time. The device can realize the variable-temperature test of the micromechanical behavior of the single fiber-asphalt-based material interface and the visualization of the process at high precision, and is of great significance to the high-performance design and application of fiber pavement materials.

column12: Multi-channel lightning current information acquisition board card
column13: The utility model discloses a multichannel lightning current information acquisition board card. An analog lightning current signal acquired by taking a Rogowski coil as a sensor is converted into a digital signal, the digital signal is transmitted to an FPFA in real time, the high-speed data processing capacity of the FPGA is utilized, an edge triggering and amplitude limiting comparison technology is adopted, a triggering threshold is reduced, meanwhile, line clutter interference is filtered out, and the lightning current signal is accurately judged; an annular queue storing and sending technology is adopted to carry out delay output on digital signals, loss of wave front data in lightning current information is avoided, and complete lightning current waveforms generated in each return stroke discharging process are truly restored. The multi-channel lightning current information acquisition circuit adopts a board card level design development mode, lightning current acquisition boardcards can be additionally arranged according to the actual situation of a site, the number of monitoring channels is further increased, meanwhile, the multi-channel lightning current acquisition board cards serve as maintainable units and can be replaced at any time, the maintenance time is shortened, and the maintainability of the system is improved.

column12: Multi-channel lightning current information acquisition board card
column13: The invention discloses a multi-channel lightning current information acquisition board card. An analog lightning current signal acquired by taking a Rogowski coil as a sensor is converted into a digital signal, the digital signal is transmitted to an FPFA in real time, the high-speed data processing capacity of the FPGA is utilized, an edge triggering and amplitude limiting comparison technologyare adopted, a triggering threshold is reduced, meanwhile, line clutter interference is filtered out, and the lightning current signal is precisely determined; an annular queue storing and sending technology is adopted for delayed output of the digital signal, loss of wave front data in lightning current information is avoided, and complete lightning current waveforms generated in each return stroke discharging process are truly restored. The multi-channel lightning current information acquisition circuit adopts a board card level design development mode, a lightning current acquisition boardcard can be additionally arranged according to the actual situation of a site, and then the number of monitoring channels is further increased, meanwhile, the multi-channel lightning current acquisition board card can serve as maintainable unit and can be replaced at any time, the maintenance time is shortened, and the maintainability of the system is improved.

column12: SHARED HIERARCHICAL DATA DESIGN MODEL FOR TRANSFERRING DATA WITHIN DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS
column13: Various techniques described herein relate to using a shared hierarchical data design model for creating and transferring data within distributed systems. Components within a distributed system may access a shared hierarchical data design model when designing and creating software components, data structures, or application programming interfaces (APIs) through which data is transferred. Additional techniques include verifying and enforcing that the components of the distributed system conform with the shared hierarchical data design model, including using design/development environments and element-by-element analyses of the data structures transferred between components of the distributed system.

column12: Intelligent granary management system
column13: The utility model discloses an intelligent granary management system, and relates to a management system, in particular to the intelligent granary management system. The utility model aims to solve the problem of lack of effective overall planning and top-level design in the informatization development of the grain industry in China at the present stage. The system comprises a monitoring large screen, a commanding and dispatching large screen, a central processor and a plurality of monitoring assemblies. The large monitoring screen and the large commanding and dispatching screen are connected with the central processing unit through data lines, the central processing unit is connected with the multiple monitoring assemblies through a wireless network, and each monitoring assembly is installed in a grain depot. The utility model belongs to the field of intelligent granaries.

column12: Capital transfer management method and system for project under construction in petrochemical industry
column13: The invention discloses a capital transfer management method for a project under construction in the petrochemical industry. The method comprises the following steps: importing materials; claiming the materials; confirming a real object; confirming and summarizing real objects; performing asset combination; combining and summarizing assets; performing value allocation; and forming asset main data. The method has the advantages that the physical assets are grabbed from a project design stage from a project design procurement source, material procurement, equipment creation, asset creation and value transfer of asset cards are connected, and use of the transfer as a key step for forming the assets is of great significance the corresponding relationship between the formed assets and equipment, subsequent equipment (asset) maintenance cost management, asset allocation and scrapping management and final realization of full-life-cycle management of equipment assets. Through top-level design, engineering project construction, equipment management and asset management are organically combined, a foundation is laid for seamless data connection of asset transfer in the construction period and the operation period of an engineering project, and data support is provided for intelligent factory construction.
column14: NINGBO DONGHAI LANFAN TECH CO LTD

column12: Gear bearing load torque test equipment
column13: The utility model provides a gear bearing load torque test device. Comprising a workbench, a torsion pulse generating device arranged on the workbench, a gear shaft fixing device connected with one side of the torsion pulse generating device and an industrial personal computer connected with the other side of the torsion pulse generating device, the gear shaft is fixed on the installation support through a first connecting piece, the gear shaft and the torsion pulse generating device are fixed through a second connecting piece, the torsion pulse generating device generates torsion acting force on the second connecting piece, and the industrial personal computer is used for controlling torque output parameters of the torsion pulse generating device. According to the test equipment, the bearing torque of the gear shaft can be checked, data comparison and analysis are carried out on a bearing torque performance design theoretical value and a product measurement actual measurement value, a data model is established, and optimization of the gear shaft by designers is facilitated.

column12: Wing structure weight analysis method in airplane overload performance design
column13: The invention belongs to the field of aircraft weight engineering, and particularly relates to a wing structure weight analysis method in aircraft overload performance design, which comprises the following steps of: classifying force bearing components of a wing, selecting a corresponding boundary constraint mode, constructing a wing structure finite element model, performing structural static strength and rigidity simulation optimization analysis on the finite element model, calculating the weight of the initial-state wing structure, and finally, calculating to obtain the structural weight ofthe wing under the current overload performance. The invention discloses a wing structure weight analysis method in airplane overload performance design. The weight of the wing under different overload performances can be quickly and accurately analyzed at the initial stage of airplane design; and the weight, the gravity center and the rotational inertia of the wing structure can be calculated through numerical values, so that the problem of incapability of analyzing the weight of the wing structure due to incapability of estimating the influence of overload performance on the weight of the wing structure in the initial stage of aircraft design by the traditional means is solved at one time.
column14: SHENYANG AIRCRAFT DESIGN & RES INST AVIC

column12: System and method for testing dynamic modulus of viscoelastic material
column13: The invention discloses a system and a method for testing the dynamic modulus of a viscoelastic material. The test system comprises a test control system, a first variable-temperature variable-pressure environment simulation device, a second variable-temperature variable-pressure environment simulation device, a variable-temperature variable-pressure system, a vibration test system, a static pressure deformation test system and a material parameter inversion module, the test system formed by the components can be used for testing the dynamic modulus of the viscoelastic material under the simulated actual temperature and pressure environment working conditions. According to the device, contact measurement is avoided, only one sample is used, all the other dynamic mechanical parameters can be obtained through one-time testing, accurate parameter input is provided for acoustic performance design of the viscoelastic material, and the problem that in acoustic performance design of the acoustic material, dynamic parameters of the viscoelastic material and a main curve at different reference temperatures cannot be accurately obtained under actual temperature and pressure environment working conditions is solved.

column12: Shielding-based hood fender design method and device
column13: The invention relates to a shielding-based hood fender design method and device, and relates to the technical field of vehicle design. The shielding-based hood fender design method comprises the following steps: obtaining multiple sets of hood fender parameter sets; based on the hood fender parameter sets, in combination with at least two preset vehicle observation orientations, carrying out hood fender analogue simulation to obtain flanging shielding rates and fastener position parameters corresponding to the hood fender parameter sets; analyzing whether the flanging shielding rates and fastener positions of the different hood fender parameter sets meet preset shielding requirement parameters or not; and recording a set of hood fender parameters meeting the shielding requirement parameters. On the basis that a new shielding structure is not added, the relation between the structure parameters of a fender and the shielding performance is obtained through analogue simulation, optimization design is conducted on the structure parameters of the fender under the condition that the shielding performance design requirement is met, and therefore the shielding performance design requirement is met.
column15: ZHANG JIE;;SUN XUDA;;GUO RUOSONG;;WANG XIANGLING;;KONG XIANGHUI

column12: System for testing friction force and slip characteristics of O-shaped rubber ring in pressurized state
column13: The invention relates to a system for testing friction force and slip characteristics of an O-shaped rubber ring in a pressurized state. Stable gas pressures with different pressures are respectivelysupplied to the two sides of the O-shaped rubber ring through the gas supply assembly at the same time. The tool valve element is driven to move relative to the tool shell and the tool shell base through the first clamp and the first connecting pin of the tension and compression tester. By arranging a first buffer container and a second buffer container, the pressure change caused by heat exchangeand tool valve element movement after the two sides of the O-shaped rubber ring are pressurized is reduced, and the friction force of the O-shaped rubber ring under various different working conditions is measured through the force sensor, the displacement sensor and the collecting equipment. According to the invention, stable gas pressures with different pressures can be supplied to the two sides of the O-shaped rubber ring simultaneously and respectively. The pressure and differential pressure boundary conditions of the O-shaped rubber ring in the working process of the gas pressure reducing valve are truly simulated, the friction force of the O-shaped rubber ring under different sliding boundary conditions is accurately measured, and data support is provided for performance design andprecision improvement of the gas pressure reducing valve.
column15: ZHANG MING;;ZANG HUI;;GUO ZHIHAI;;BAI MUYAN;;SHI YUPENG;;XU LIYUN
column32: 沈明学: "往复轴封氟橡胶O型圈微动摩擦学特性", 《机械工程学报》

column12: Method for fusing radar point cloud and image data in water traffic environment
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of multi-sensor fusion, and discloses a method for fusing radar point cloud and image data in a water traffic environment. The method comprises the following steps of: firstly, preprocessing image data, namely generating corresponding binary image data from the image data acquired by a camera; carrying out noise reduction processing through a Gaussian filtering algorithm; performing image segmentation by using a maximum between-class variance method; carrying out edge extraction through a Canny algorithm; then, performing format conversion and 3DTiles pyramid space structure slicing on point cloud data; and finally, by extracting angular points with obvious image data features and corresponding point cloud data angular points, constructing a matching objective function, solving the objective function by using a least square method, obtaining a fusion matrix, and meanwhile, by using designed self-feedback adjustment, reducing errors brought by a calibration algorithm, and enabling a fusion result to be more accurate. A fusion result is presented in a visual mode, and the three-dimensional complete information of a target is obtained.

column12: Method of inspecting a specimen and system thereof
column13: There are provided a method of generating an inspection recipe usable for inspecting an inspection area of a specimen and a recipe generating unit. The recipe generating unit is configured: upon obtaining design data informative of design structural elements comprised in a design PoI corresponding to the at least one PoI, to provide global segmentation of a test image captured by an inspection tool unit from the inspection area and comprising at least one test PoI of substantially the same design as the at least one PoI, thereby to obtain segmented structural elements comprised in the test PoI and segmentation configuration data; to associate the segmented structural elements comprised in the test PoI with the design structural elements comprised in the design PoI, thereby to obtain design association data; and to generate an inspection recipe comprising, at least, segmentation configuration data and design association data.
