column12: PID Method of automatically creating Intelligent PID drawings by using information of design stored in a database
column13: The present invention relates to a method for automatically making intelligent P&ID drawings using design information stored in a database to check consistency with other design products. According to the present invention, the method comprises: a step of mapping the design information stored in the database with predefined intelligent P&ID to convert the design information and storing correlation and information of the converted data; a primary line modeling step; a step of calculating a line and a connector to be connected to a symbol in an intelligent P&ID drawing in which a primary line is modeled and modeling a symbol connecting the symbol and the primary line; a step of modeling a utility line; and a step of linking the primary line and the utility line with attribute information of a line number placed in the closest position to model the primary line and the utility line.

column12: Power module simulation test system and test system of new energy automobile
column13: The utility model provides a power module test system and a new energy automobile main drive power unit test system, and the power module simulation test system at least comprises an industrial control host, a power control assembly and a power inductance load, and can simulate a motor load test through the power inductance load. And the power control assembly is used for providing electric power and control signals for the power module, so that electrical capability design, thermal performance design, limit design, test and evaluation can be independently carried out on the main driver and the power module of the power module completely without depending on a motor test bench (dynamometer) and a motor control algorithm; therefore, a motor test rack (dynamometer) can be omitted from the aspect of test system composition, the cost of an expensive high-speed motor, a dynamometer system and the like is saved, the investment cost is low, and the problems of large rack system investment, inconvenience in use, difficulty in maintenance, large energy consumption and the like are solved.

column12: Car lamp support strength design method and device considering injection molding factor influence
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of automobiles, and particularly relates to an automobile lamp support strength design method and device considering the influence of injection molding factors. According to the method, mold flow simulation is conducted on the automobile lamp support in the early stage, the residual stress and the fiber distribution direction of the automobile lamp support after injection molding are obtained, the mold flow simulation result is mapped to structure simulation analysis software, the automobile lamp support strength design method considering the automobile lamp injection molding factor influence is obtained, and performance design is conducted on the automobile lamp support. Moreover, the simulation analysis precision of the vehicle lamp bracket can be effectively improved, strength performance virtual verification is performed on the vehicle lamp bracket in a product development stage, the risk of subsequent failure of the vehicle lamp bracket is reduced, the development period of a vehicle lamp product is shortened, and the mold cost of re-mold opening of the product due to an unqualified structure is reduced. And the digital intelligence means of vehicle lamp product development is effectively improved.

column12: Simulation and test method and device based on electromagnetic valve performance, electronic equipment and storage medium
column13: The invention relates to a simulation and test method and device based on the performance of an electromagnetic valve, electronic equipment and a storage medium, the simulation and test method and device are applied to equipment loaded with an integrated joint simulation test system, the joint simulation test system comprises a simulation subsystem and a test subsystem, and the method comprises the steps that basic parameters of the electromagnetic valve are obtained, obtaining system setting parameters of the joint simulation test system, applying the basic parameters and the system setting parameters to the simulation subsystem to obtain a performance simulation result of the electromagnetic valve, determining a performance test result of the electromagnetic valve based on the test subsystem and the target controller, and comparing the performance simulation result with the performance test result to obtain the performance simulation result of the electromagnetic valve. And obtaining performance difference information between the performance simulation result and the performance test result. Based on the embodiment of the invention, the simulation and test of the performance design of the electromagnetic valve can be carried out in an independent joint simulation test system, and the design efficiency of the electromagnetic valve is improved.

column12: Sampling method, system, equipment and terminal fusing design knowledge
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of information technology service, and particularly relates to a sampling method, system, equipment and terminal for fusing design knowledge, comprising the following steps: if expert knowledge (such as formula knowledge, image knowledge, description knowledge and the like) or database knowledge exists in a given problem, determining parameters of prior parameter distribution through the knowledge; parameters for controlling a probability density function in parameter distribution are updated by using data in an iteration process, so that the probability that a scheme with the optimal performance is selected is higher and higher, and'on-demand distribution 'of knowledge-guided sampling is realized. According to the method, expert knowledge or database knowledge is fused with Beta distribution, sample point generation under performance guidance is achieved, the problem that a traditional sampling method based on geometric distance cannot use design knowledge for sampling is solved, and optimization efficiency and quality are improved.

column12: Complex curtain wall construction method based on three-dimensional laser scanner
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of building construction, and discloses a complex curtain wall construction method based on a three-dimensional laser scanner, which comprises the following steps: deviation inspection in the installation process: setting out by using design coordinates, scanning by using the three-dimensional laser scanner in the installation process of a keel frame, comparing the deviation condition with a design model, and determining the deviation of the keel frame; the magnitude and direction of the installation deviation are provided for a steel structure unit to guide the next installation; steel keel lofting: extracting coordinates of a center line of a keel frame in the design model, taking a positioning point at the top and a positioning point at the bottom, and performing lofting positioning by adopting a high-precision measurement robot; and building a keel frame three-dimensional model: carrying out three-dimensional entity modeling on the scanning data. According to the complex curtain wall construction method based on the three-dimensional laser scanner, accurate installation is achieved, the problem that lofting of a special-shaped curved glass curtain wall is difficult is solved, waste and construction period delay caused by size deviation are effectively reduced, material waste is reduced, and installation efficiency is improved.

Real-time font effect picture synthesis system based on pc end and operation method
column13: The invention discloses a pc-end-based real-time font effect picture synthesis system, which comprises a matching algorithm unit, an input unit, an instruction adjustment unit, a preview generation unit and an output unit, an operation method of the pc-end-based real-time font effect picture synthesis system comprises the following steps: step 1, inputting font data into the input unit, and performing data matching by the matching algorithm unit; configuring a material and a creative effect, and performing font bitmap to calculate an edge distance; step 2, adjusting materials, styles and colors by an adjusting instruction unit; step 3, generating and previewing the effect picture by a previewing unit, and outputting the previewed effect picture in a JPG or PNG format; and 4, directly dragging the picture into the software through dragging. The invention belongs to the field of font design, and particularly relates to a system and an operation method for synthesizing font effect pictures in real time based on a pc (personal computer) end, which have the advantages that styles are prepared in advance, preview effect pictures are quickly generated in real time, the efficiency of using design software by a user can be effectively improved, and time and operation cost are saved.

column12: System for positioning assembly line bottleneck in chip assembly line division, and application
column13: The invention discloses a system for positioning assembly line bottlenecks in chip assembly line division, and application, and relates to the technical field of integrated circuit design. The system comprises a verification counting device and a bottleneck positioning device. The verification counting device is used for carrying out simulation verification on pipeline level design of a user and calculating clock cycle number information, including a first clock cycle number and a second clock cycle number, of a pipeline level sub-module processing pipeline unit in the simulation verification process; the first clock cycle number and the second clock cycle number are respectively a pipeline unit cycle number calculated when the sub-module processes the pipeline unit and a pipeline unit actual cycle number calculated when the sub-module processes the pipeline unit on the pipeline system; and the bottleneck positioning device is used for positioning the bottleneck module in the pipeline design according to the first clock cycle number and the second clock cycle number. The pipeline bottleneck is quickly positioned by comparing the performance of each module in the pipeline level and the performance of the modules on the system, and the design iteration and performance optimization process can be remarkably accelerated.

column12: Single packaging body fusing multiple chip packaging
column13: The invention, which relates to the integrated circuit field, discloses a single packaging body integrating multiple chip packaging, comprising a packaging module, a heat dissipation optimization module, an electromagnetic interference isolation module, a simulation verification module, a maintenance upgrading module, a fault maintenance module, a power management module, a debugging optimization module, an electrostatic impedance protection module and a control interface module. Through the heat dissipation optimization module, the heat dissipation effect of the whole packaging body is improved, and the heat dissipation problem of a traditional packaging body is solved; signal interference among different modules is isolated through the electromagnetic interference isolation module; system-level design and verification are carried out through the simulation verification module; different chip modules are independently designed through a modular design method; the maintenance and upgrading module is provided with a chip slot which is easy to disassemble and assemble, so that the maintenance and upgrading cost and difficulty are reduced; according to the invention, the defects of heat dissipation, mutual interference, high design difficulty and difficult maintenance and upgrade of a traditional packaging body are overcome.
column14: ZHEJIANG RUIZHAOXIN SEMICONDUCTOR TECH CO LTD

column12: Complete vehicle modeling and building method for self-leveling crawler
column13: The invention discloses a whole-vehicle modeling and building method of a self-leveling crawler, which adopts a four-point leveling design, and respectively considers stress balance of a body of the crawler and a chassis of the crawler in the vertical, pitching and side-tipping directions and the vertical direction of wheels, so that a whole-vehicle mathematical model of the crawler is built in simulation software; a leveling hydraulic cylinder system model is established in simulation software, the leveling hydraulic cylinder system model is used for outputting main power of a hydraulic cylinder, and a fuzzy self-adaptive PID controller is used for controlling the position of the hydraulic cylinder; performing joint simulation on the whole crawler mathematical model and the leveling hydraulic cylinder system model in simulation software, and applying hydraulic cylinder active force output by the leveling hydraulic cylinder system model to the whole crawler model so as to complete construction of the whole crawler model; and building a pavement excitation model, regulating and controlling parameters in the whole-vehicle model of the crawler according to an effect fed back by the pavement excitation model, optimizing the whole-vehicle model, and building the whole-vehicle model of the self-leveling crawler.

column12: Simulation test design method based on evaluation indexes
column13: The embodiment of the invention discloses an evaluation index-based simulation test design method, which comprises the following steps of: analyzing a scenario file input by a user according to a simulation evaluation index requirement, generating a simulation test factor structure tree, and selecting a required simulation test factor in the simulation test factor structure tree; selecting a test factor level design method, and generating a simulation test factor sample; selecting a test scheme design method according to the simulation test factor sample, and generating a simulation test factor combination; generating a simulation test scenario file according to the simulation test factor combination; and if the evaluation requirement is met, performing evaluation analysis on the simulation test scenario file, and finding an optimal factor level combination meeting the evaluation index. According to the method, the optimal design result is quickly found by scientifically setting parameters and efficiently searching the value space, global optimization can be ensured, a plurality of factors influencing the characteristic value of the test result are found out, and the factor level combination under the optimal test condition is determined.

column12: Existing nuclear safety related plant concrete structure performance evaluation method
column13: The invention discloses an existing nuclear safety related plant concrete structure performance evaluation method. The method comprises the following steps: (1) dividing an existing nuclear safety related plant into structure areas with different anti-seismic requirements by taking plant failure safety risks as judgment points, and formulating different structure recheck standard requirements; (2) carrying out durability evaluation and strength analysis on the plant, and determining the current mechanical property and bearing capacity of existing plant structural members; (3) determining a numerical calculation model of the existing nuclear safety related plant, applying a load effect on the model, and then performing performance analogue simulation calculation; and (4) for a performance analogue simulation calculation result, macroscopically evaluating structural overall anti-seismic performance of the existing nuclear safety related plant. According to the method provided by the invention, the structural performance design concept is applied to the maximum extent, an existing plant can be continuously put into use as much as possible, the improvement of a nuclear safety related plant structural design technology is promoted, and the method is advanced in technology, safe, reliable and easy to implement.

column12: Shipboard aircraft undercarriage skating obstacle crossing impact test equipment and test method
column13: The invention provides a shipboard aircraft undercarriage skating obstacle crossing impact test device and a test method, and belongs to the technical field of aircraft test. The test equipment comprises a mounting chassis of which the upper end is provided with a mounting bracket, a hanging basket assembly arranged on the mounting bracket, an undercarriage connected with the hanging basket assembly, and an obstacle crossing impact test assembly arranged on the bottom surface of the mounting chassis, the sliding obstacle crossing process of the shipboard aircraft is simulated in a laboratory, the obstacle crossing performance of the undercarriage at different sliding speeds can be obtained by adjusting the inflation pressure of the gas gun launching element, the obstacle crossing performance of the undercarriage at different heights can be obtained by adjusting the height of the obstacle module through the micro hydraulic cylinder, more parameter characteristics are provided for an obstacle crossing impact test, and the obstacle crossing performance of the undercarriage at different sliding speeds is improved. The accuracy of a test result is improved, and a corresponding basis is provided for evaluating and judging the influence of the performance design and service life estimation of the landing gear of the shipboard aircraft and the sliding obstacle crossing load on the body structure of the shipboard aircraft.

column12: Plasma cladding method for TiC enhanced Al-Co-Cr-Fe-Ni-Nb high-entropy alloy curved surface coating
column13: The invention discloses a plasma cladding method for a TiC enhanced Al-Co-Cr-Fe-Ni-Nb high-entropy alloy curved surface coating, and relates to research on a preparation method of a high-entropy alloy coating by a robot trajectory control algorithm and a cladding process. The method aims at solving the problems that an existing plasma cladding technology lacks automatic control, accurate control over preparation of any complex free curve curved surface coating is difficult to achieve, and traditional alloy is single in performance. By researching an NURBS curve surface and an NURBS function mapping curve principle, a machining control algorithm for a complex curve surface model based on robot plasma cladding is provided, and high-entropy alloy components are determined according to a high-entropy alloy component design theory and main performance design of all elements; the high-entropy alloy coating is prepared through a robot-based plasma cladding remanufacturing platform, the performance of the prepared high-entropy alloy coating is detected through performance detection equipment, and a final detection result shows that the performance of the coating is superior to that of a base material.

column12: Low-energy-consumption building key parameter performance design method and system
column13: The invention provides a low-energy-consumption building key parameter performance design method and system, and the method comprises the steps: sorting key parameters affecting the building load and the market prices of building parts corresponding to the key parameters under different performance indexes, and obtaining a price performance relation model of the building parts; a building energy consumption simulation model is established according to the building drawing, and building loads under multiple groups of different key parameters are obtained; establishing a rapid load prediction model of the building by using the plurality of groups of key parameters and the building load obtained by simulation; and outputting a design parameter combination and a load index in combination with the price performance relation model of the building component and the rapid load prediction model. The method has the advantages that the process can be achieved for different civil buildings, and universality is high; a building designer can realize model building and optimization calculation through the method and obtain an optimization result, and the learning cost is low; optimization aims at full-life-period technical economy optimization, and actual engineering requirements are met.

column12: Door protection plate design method for optimizing side impact performance
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of door protection plate development and design, and discloses a door protection plate design method for optimizing side collision performance, which comprises the following steps: decomposing collision energy suffered by a door protection plate, calculating invasion amount and collision energy suffered by different areas on the door protection plate, and designing each area of the door protection plate according to energy absorption characteristics of the different areas on the door protection plate. And carrying out design verification analysis through computer simulation, obtaining design parameters of the door protection plate after verification is passed, and otherwise, returning to design of each area of the door protection plate. According to the door protection plate design method for optimizing the side collision performance, design and development are carried out on the basis of collision energy and the door protection plate invasion amount according to the energy absorption characteristics of different areas on the door protection plate, the maturity of the side collision performance of the door protection plate is effectively improved, and the design and development cost of a total value chain is reduced.

column12: Multi-target building performance design expert system and method based on sensitivity matrix
column13: The invention discloses a multi-target building performance design expert system and method based on a sensitivity matrix, which are used for assisting a designer in carrying out performance optimization-based rapid design on a scheme in a building scheme design stage. The method comprises the following steps: scheme information acquisition: reading an initial scheme of a user and an expected value of the user for a performance target; evaluating the performance level of the current scheme through simulation or prediction; a multi-objective optimization algorithm based on a sensitivity matrixis used, a database module is called to carry out rapid performance optimization based on the initial scheme, and performance simulation is carried out on a set of schemes obtained through optimization; a scheme modification suggestion and an optimization scheme are fed back to a designer through a user interaction interface and an interpreter module, and the designer can quickly select an optimization scheme with improved performance as a result according to the suggestion or repeat the optimization process. According to the system, multi-objective optimization is guided by using a sensitivity matrix, and multiple scheme performance objectives are brought into a design decision in the initial stage of design.

column12: PERIPHERAL TOOL
column13: A system having design tools and methods for using the same in designing an integrated circuit (IC) are described. In one embodiment, an IC design system, the system comprises one or more processors; and a non-transitory computer readable medium connected to the one or more processors, wherein the non-transitory computer readable medium is configured to store: a first design tool module configured to determine one or more design specifications for a core of an integrated circuit (IC), the IC comprising a plurality of transistors and other components, and a plurality of interconnects between the transistors and the other components, wherein the plurality of transistors and the other components and the plurality of interconnects are formed on a single die, and a second design tool module configured to determine one or more design specifications for a periphery of the IC, the second tool to function independently of the first tool and operable to design constraints for interface placement and configuration of an interface between the core and the periphery of IC.

column12: A ROAD ALIGNMENT MANAGEMENT SERVER AND METHOD THEREOF
column13: The present invention relates to a method for generating a road design drawing capable of displaying survey information on a road which is surveyed and transmitted from a surveying instrument at a civil construction site by using a road basic drawing generated by a design company, and a management serer of the road design drawing in which when a user requests to use the drawing to download the drawing after the drawing is registered on the server, the server transmits the drawing to a corresponding terminal, and when the corresponding terminal directly inputs a setting key and authentication password after the corresponding terminal accesses a URL, the server compares the setting key and authentication password preset in the corresponding terminal with the received setting key and authentication password. When the setting key and authentication password preset in the corresponding terminal and the received setting key and authentication password match each other, usable design drawing data is transmitted to an MDN of the corresponding terminal, thereby confirming ownership and enhancing security.

column12: Method and device for simulating adsorption-diffusion behavior of active nanoparticle oil/water interface
column13: The invention discloses an active nanoparticle oil/water interface adsorption-diffusion behavior simulation method and device, and relates to the field of petroleum and natural gas exploitation, and the method comprises the following steps: simulating oil displacement by water through a color gradient model in a Boltzmann method, simulating the movement process of active nanoparticles in a water phase and an oil/water interface through a Langevin kinematics method, and calculating the adsorption-diffusion behavior of the active nanoparticles in the oil/water interface. Constructing an action relationship between the fluid and the active nano-particles, realizing coupling between the active nano-particles and the fluid, and establishing a mutual influence relationship between a velocity field and an energy field between the active nano-particles and the fluid; parameters such as the radius, the master control group, the concentration and the injection flow rate of the active nanoparticles are input into the model, the adsorption characteristics of the active nanoparticles on the oil/water interface are depicted, and the difference of the diffusion characteristics of the active nanoparticles in the water phase and the oil/water interface is analyzed. The structural performance design and field use of the active nanoparticle oil displacement material are further guided, and economic, effective and sustainable development of low-permeability/ultra-low-permeability oil reservoirs in China is boosted.
column32: 孙东科等: "格子玻尔兹曼方法模拟弯流道中粒子的惯性迁移行为", 《物理学报》;;周国峰等: "基于时驱硬球算法与格子玻尔兹曼方法的颗粒流体系统直接数值模拟", 《科学通报》;;王思娴等: "水基纳米流体流动与换热数值模拟", 《能源工程》

column12: Multi-channel product aging test platform
column13: A multi-channel product aging test platform disclosed by the present invention comprises a test box, a test board card, a switching power supply and extension sockets are electrically installed in the test box, the extension sockets are located at the two sides in the test box, a cover plate is positioned at the upper end of the test box, a computer terminal and a support are positioned on the cover plate, and the computer terminal and the support are electrically connected with the test box. A display is positioned on the support, a power distribution unit is arranged on the side of the test box, and the rear end of the test box is electrically connected with a Type-C connector, an aviation head connector, a network port and a power port. According to the multi-channel product aging test platform, the test board card and the electronic load board card can accurately simulate the current required by the product, the test time is greatly shortened through the 10-channel design, the test requirements of customers are met, and the product aging test platform is small in size, multi-channel and board-card-level design, so that the product aging test efficiency is greatly improved. The size and the cost of the equipment are greatly reduced, and the test efficiency is improved.
column14: SUZHOU YUNTAILI AUTOMATION EQUIPMENT CO LTD

column12: Automobile range extender noise matching method, device and equipment and readable storage medium
column13: The invention relates to an automobile range extender noise matching method, device and equipment and a readable storage medium, and relates to the technical field of range extenders, and the method comprises the steps: in a virtual sample automobile stage, based on a preset structure noise simulation route and a preset air noise simulation route, carrying out the analogue simulation of the structure noise and air noise of the range extender at different rotating speeds, obtaining a range extender noise curve; acquiring a background noise curve and an in-vehicle target noise curve corresponding to a preset NVH performance design target; determining corresponding range extender noise maximum values under different vehicle speeds based on the background noise curve and the in-vehicle target noise curve; and range extender target rotating speeds corresponding to different vehicle speeds are matched based on the range extender noise maximum value and the range extender noise curve. According to the method and the device, the range extender noise matching design can be realized in the virtual sample vehicle stage, so that the timeliness and the working efficiency of the range extender noise matching design are greatly improved, and the workload and the cost of the range extender noise matching design are effectively reduced.
column15: SHI JIAOHUA;;LUO TING;;TIAN XIN;;PAN FENG;;ZHANG LEI

column12: Method for calculating full-wave numerical value of electrical property of radome under coupling of thermal power and electric three fields
column13: The invention discloses a full-wave numerical calculation method for the electrical performance of a radome under thermal-electric three-field coupling, and the method comprises the steps: building a shared grid model of thermal, mechanical and electric simulation based on the division of a tetrahedral grid; performing transient thermal analysis according to the thermal load to obtain a transient temperature field; according to the force load and the temperature field, calculating the deformation of the radome under the thermal joint effect, and updating the shared grid model into a deformed shared grid model; refining the deformed shared grid model to obtain an electromagnetic simulation grid model; interpolating to obtain a temperature field of the electromagnetic simulation grid model; the geometric structure and temperature information of the electromagnetic simulation grid model are output to an electromagnetic numerical calculation module, and an electromagnetic numerical calculation model is constructed; and simulating and calculating the electrical performance by adopting a moment method based on a body equivalence principle. The method solves the problem of high-precision calculation of the influence of stress deformation and temperature-induced dielectric property change on the electrical performance of the radome, and effectively ensures the heaven and earth consistency of the electrical performance design of the high-speed aircraft radome.
column14: BEIJING REMOTE SENSING EQUIPMENT RES INSTITUTE

column12: Bird impact resistance design method for front edge of aero-engine fan rotor blade
column13: The invention provides an aero-engine fan rotor blade front edge bird-strike-resistant design method which comprises the steps that bird-strike simulation analysis or testing is conducted on a fan rotor blade in a bird-strike state, and the damage condition of the front edge of the fan rotor blade after bird strike is obtained; evaluating the damage condition of the front edge of the fan rotor blade after bird impact; determining a weak part according to a damage evaluation result; extracting a blade front edge damage deformation area and parameters of the thin part; extracting the thickness and the distribution curve thereof in the range of the loss deformation area; increasing the thickness in the range of the loss deformation area; carrying out bird strike simulation analysis on the improved fan rotor blade to obtain the damage condition of the front edge of the blade after bird strike; if the damage of the front edge of the blade does not exceed the design requirement, ending the bird strike resistance design of the front edge of the blade; if the blade front edge damage exceeds the design requirement damage, the aerodynamic performance design requirement is lowered, and the blade front edge area thickness is increased till the design requirement is met.

column12: Engine suspension connection point strength simulation method and device and storage medium
column13: The invention discloses an engine suspension connection point strength simulation method and device and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of automobiles, and the method comprises the steps: building an engine performance simulation model: building a dynamometer rack working condition engine finite element simulation model; establishing an engine dynamics simulation model; carrying out suspension load treatment; and performing stress calculation on the engine suspension position based on the load table. According to the method, the advantages that virtual simulation analysis is short in period and does not need to have real objects are fully utilized, and strength performance prediction of the engine suspension connection point position under the working condition of a dynamometer rack can be achieved only through a basic performance design boundary and a three-dimensional model from the combustion boundary to the suspension load to structural strength calculation; according to the method, the problem that the strength simulation item of the engine suspension connection point position is lacked under the dynamometer rack working condition is solved, the method can be used in the earlier stage of product development, structural optimization design is guided, and the situation that the strength design of the engine suspension connection point position is insufficient is effectively avoided.

column12: Multi-material-level automatic feeding and grabbing device
column13: The utility model provides a multi-material-level automatic feeding and grabbing device. The multi-material-level automatic feeding and grabbing device comprises a carrying mechanism, an automatic feeding mechanism and a storage bin. The carrying mechanism comprises a robot, a vacuum generator, a robot suction cup hand and a robot rack. The automatic feeding mechanism comprises a linear electric cylinder, an automatic feeding mechanism rack, a feeding plate, a feeding plate jacking column, a linear bearing, a linear guide column and a cover type nut. The storage bin comprises a storage bin shell, a storage position and a feeding jacking column hole. According to the device, light materials (such as chocolate bars and ice cream sticks) can be automatically fed, and feeding is fast; the storage bin is of a multi-material-level design, a plurality of materials can be stored in each material level, multiple times of continuous feeding can be supported, and the efficiency is high; one material is adsorbed by two suction nozzles, so that stable and reliable suction is ensured; the robot is used as a feeding execution mechanism, the action is fast, the efficiency is high, and the high repeated positioning precision of the robot can realize accurate placement of materials; the device is favorable for realizing automatic transformation of a production line.
column15: LI YA;;ZHANG JINXING;;WU YUPENG;;CHEN ZHENG;;CUI YAN;;ZHENG ZIPEI

column12: Design method of oil-gas mixed pressure oil tank
column13: The invention relates to a method for designing an oil-gas mixed pressure oil tank, which comprises a method for determining the capacity of the pressure oil tank and relates to oil-gas proportion, oil circulation times and volume design criteria. The method comprises a pressure oil tank structure design method, and relates to an oil tank shape design criterion, a dead cavity, oil suction pipe and oil return pipe positions, an oil drain valve position, a transmission device working limit posture pressure oil tank liquid level design criterion and the like. The method comprises a simulation calculation method for the performance of the pressure oil tank, and relates to pressure oil tank modeling, air pump and constant pressure valve modeling, lubricating system modeling and evaluation of the oil supply capacity of the pressure oil tank under different dynamic working conditions. The oil-gas mixing pressure oil tank is adopted, the functions of controlling, cooling and lubricating can be achieved, and the function of the oil tank is widened; and by reasonably matching the flow of the hydraulic system, the residence of lubricating oil in the oil pan is reduced, the oil stirring loss is reduced, and the efficiency of the transmission system is improved. The digital design capability of the pressure oil tank is improved, and the iterative design period is shortened.

column12: Turbine test bed of aero-engine under high altitude and low Reynolds number, simulation method and application
column13: The invention provides a simulation method and application of an aero-engine turbine test system under a high-altitude low Reynolds number. The method comprises the steps that input conditions such as performance design points and limit boundaries of an aero-engine air inlet system are obtained through arrangement, and design points and limit boundaries of an exhaust system under the high-altitude low Reynolds number working environment are obtained through analysis; obtaining injection coefficients of active flow and passive flow of the ejector according to the design principle of the ejector; preliminary design parameters of the exhaust system are obtained through numerical simulation; the preliminary design parameters are repeatedly optimized according to limiting conditions, and finally the exhaust contour is determined; due to the fact that an air inlet system and the pressure and flow ranges required by active flow and passive flow of an ejector are different, a pressure reducing valve needs to be selected based on the design standard of a pressure reducing valve for compressed air JISB3372-1982, and finally the opening degree of the pressure reducing valve and the longest test time under the working condition are determined. According to the turbine test system simulation method provided by the invention, rapid design and shaping of the test system can be realized, so that the test process is simpler, more convenient and more accurate.

column12: Laser single-channel cladding forming control method for alloy steel
column13: The invention relates to a single-channel cladding layer forming control method with 17GrNi6Mo as a base material and Ni60 powder as a cladding material, in particular to a laser single-channel cladding forming control method for alloy steel. The method is characterized by comprising the following steps: firstly, carrying out a laser single-channel cladding experiment by adopting a center composite experiment design based on a response surface method and changing process parameters such as laser power, powder feeding amount and scanning speed; then, carrying out fitting and variance analysis on the obtained experimental data by using Design-Expert software, constructing a width and height regression model of the process parameters and the formed shape of the cladding layer, and verifying the prediction precision of the regression model through experiments; and finally, analyzing the influence of laser cladding process parameters on the forming shape of the cladding layer. Although certain errors exist in the method, the mathematical models of the width and the height of the cladding layer can be subjected to high-precision prediction from the analysis of the errors.

column12: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR PREFERENCE ELICITATION ON CAR DESIGNS
column13: Systems and methods for providing a design with consumer feedback are provided. The method may include receiving a design within a design environment, wherein the design comprises a plurality of attributes. The method may further include automatically generating, using a computer model, consumer-based feedback regarding at least one attribute of the plurality of attributes. The method may additionally include presenting the consumer-based feedback within the design environment in real-time.

column12: Integrated secondary flow pintle engine experimental device
column13: The utility model discloses an integrated secondary flow pintle engine experimental device. The experimental device comprises a front end socket, a secondary flow gas collection chamber and a three-section pintle assembly which are installed in sequence. A combustion chamber covers the three-section type throat bolt assembly, a plurality of charging sleeves are installed between an inner cavity of the combustion chamber and the three-section type throat bolt assembly, one end face of the combustion chamber and the three-section type throat bolt assembly are fixedly installed, the other end face of the combustion chamber is provided with an opening, a convergent section is arranged at the opening, and a spray pipe shell covers the convergent section. A throat part is installed at the end, away from the opening, of the convergent section, the three-section type throat bolt assembly extends into the through hole, and a rear sealing head is installed at the end, away from the opening, of the spray pipe shell; and the secondary flow gas collection chamber is provided with a gas collection chamber pressure sensor welding head and a plurality of jet pipe joints. According to the utility model, the secondary flow pintle engine is subjected to processing level design, the problems of engine basic scheme, secondary jet injection design, engine thermal protection design and the like are solved, and the whole engine can be directly subjected to processing and ignition experiments.
column15: YAN DONGFENG;;ZHENG XIAOYU;;XIAO YI;;WANG JIE;;WANG LIANG;;LIU XIAOLEI

column12: Brake disc heat capacity simulation analysis method based on contact pressure distribution
column13: The invention relates to a brake disc thermal capacity simulation analysis method based on contact pressure distribution. The method comprises the following steps: fitting real material parameters of a friction plate according to a friction plate compression ratio calibration test result; determining a disc contact area through contact pressure distribution simulation; building of a brake disc heat capacity simulation model is completed; rack working condition brake disc heat capacity simulation is carried out, and rack working condition heat performance evaluation is carried out; evaluating the whole vehicle working condition heat performance, and if the performance passes, achieving a brake disc heat capacity performance design scheme. According to the brake disc heat capacity simulation analysis method, through a thermosetting coupling CAE simulation method, real material parameters of a friction plate are adopted, convection heat transfer boundaries close to the reality are adopted for different areas of a brake disc, and the contact area of the brake disc and a friction surface is defined according to the actual braking situation; the calculation efficiency and precision of thermal capacity simulation of the brake disc can be effectively improved, the one-time passing rate of the test of the design scheme is ensured, the research and development period of the brake disc is shortened, and the research and development cost is saved.
column15: CHANG JINYUN;;JIANG DAXIN;;MA MINGHUI;;HAN CHAO;;WANG TAO;;WU XIAOYI;;HU FENG

column12: Nitrogen treatment furnace device for etched foil
column13: The utility model relates to a corrosion foil nitrogen processing furnace device which comprises a fixed frame and a furnace body, the furnace body is vertically installed on the fixed frame, the furnace body is provided with a feeding port and a discharging port, an electric heating pipe is arranged in the furnace body, the furnace body is sequentially provided with a pre-drying area, an upper temperature area and a lower temperature area from top to bottom, and each area is provided with a temperature sensor. A nitrogen charging area is arranged on one side of the lower temperature area of the furnace body and connected with a nitrogen machine, ceramic clamping rollers are arranged on the two sides of the feeding port and the discharging port of the furnace body, and the corrosion foil is pulled into and out of the furnace body through the ceramic clamping rollers. The vertical treatment furnace device is compact in structure, and the space of a production line is saved; the furnace body is filled with high-purity nitrogen, so that the aluminum atom crystal phase structure of the corrosion foil is protected at high temperature, and the specific volume of the corrosion foil is improved; the high-sealing performance design is adopted, a high-molecular heat preservation material is adopted in the furnace body, an inner container metal material is omitted, heat is prevented from being conducted outwards, nitrogen protection is increased, and the corrosion foil performance is improved.

column12: High-frequency calculation method for electric performance of radome under thermal power and electric three-field coupling
column13: The invention discloses a high-frequency calculation method for the electrical performance of a radome under the coupling of thermal power and electric three fields, and the method comprises the steps: building a shared grid model of thermal, mechanical and electric simulation based on the division of a tetrahedral grid; performing transient thermal analysis according to the thermal load to obtain a transient temperature field; according to the force load and the temperature field, calculating the deformation of the radome under the thermal joint effect, and updating the shared grid model into a deformed shared grid model; refining the deformed shared grid model to obtain an electromagnetic simulation grid model; interpolating to obtain a temperature field of the electromagnetic simulation grid model; the geometric structure and temperature information of the electromagnetic simulation grid model are output to an electromagnetic numerical calculation module, and an electromagnetic numerical calculation model is constructed; and carrying out electromagnetic simulation calculation by adopting a high-frequency method to obtain the electric performance of the radome under thermal-electric three-field coupling. According to the method, the problem of rapid calculation of the influence of stress deformation and temperature-induced dielectric temperature drift of the electrically large antenna housing on the electrical performance of the antenna housing is solved, and the heaven and earth consistency of the electrical performance design of the antenna housing of a high-speed aircraft is effectively ensured.

column12: PATTERN INSPECTION DEVICE AND PATTERN INSPECTION METHOD
column13: To provide an inspection device that can reduce pseudo defects arising from an originally not-existing streaky or band-like pseudo pattern outside a graphic pattern in an electron beam inspection.SOLUTION: An inspection device 100 comprises: an image acquisition mechanism 150 that scans on a substrate having a graphic pattern formed by an electron beam, and acquires a secondary electronic image to be discharged in accordance with irradiation of the electron beam by the scan; a reference image preparation circuit 112 that prepares a reference image of an area corresponding to an image to be inspected, using design pattern data serving as a basis of the graphic pattern; a spatial frequency distribution preparation circuit 173 that prepares a two-dimensional spatial frequency distribution of the reference image; a filter circuit 174 that performs filter processing of eliminating a spatial frequency component other than a low spatial frequency component; a regeneration circuit 176 that regenerates an image in the area of the reference image having the low spatial frequency component left; and a comparison circuit 108 that compares the image to be inspected with the reference image on the basis of the regenerated image.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

column12: TROJAN INSERTION TOOL
column13: A method and system for evaluating software tools that detect malicious hardware modifications is provided. In one embodiment, among others, a system comprises a computing device and an application. The application causes the computing device to at least receive hardware description language code that represents a circuit design and calculate a signal probability for one or more nodes in the circuit design. The application also causes the computing device to identify one or more rare nodes in the circuit design and generate a Trojan sample population. The application further causes the computing device to generate a feasible Trojan population and generate a Trojan test instance based at least in part on a random selection from the Trojan feasible population. Additionally, the application causes the computing device to generate modified hardware description code from the Trojan test instance.

column12: METHODS AND SYSTEMS AND APPARATUS TO SUPPORT REDUCED ENERGY AND WATER USAGE
column13: Provided is a method of signalling a command to a water heating appliance remote from a controllable water outlet fed from the appliance via a water supply installation, the method comprising: monitoring the water supply that feeds the controllable water outlet; detecting a sequence of changes in a property or state of the water supply consequent on operation of the controllable water outlet; correlating the sequence of changes with a stored pattern; detecting a match above a stored threshold; interpreting the match as a command. It is thus possible to manipulate a tap, or other controllable water outlet, to signal to a processor so that the temperature or flow rate of water supplied by the outlet can be increased. Thus a water supply system may have default flow and temperature levels designed for economy and low water usage, but a user can on demand override one or both of these limitations without the necessity of needing to go to the appliance to reset it. The water heating appliance is preferably an instantaneous water heating appliance. Also provided is a water supply installation including a water heating appliance, a controllable water outlet remote from the appliance, a water supply line arranged to feed the controllable water outlet with heated water from the appliance, and at least one sensor to sense a property or state of the water supply line, and a processor coupled to the at least one sensor; the processor being configured to detect a sequence of changes in a property or state of the water supply consequent on operation of the controllable water outlet; correlate the sequence of changes with a stored pattern; detect a match above a stored threshold; interpret the match as a command; and take an action in accordance with the command.

column12: SEMIAUTOMATIC MEASURING BED FOR ANIMAL STERILIZATION.
column13: The present invention relates to a semiautomatic measuring bed for animal sterilization and its process. Said device consists of a bed that automatically measures weight and temperature, throwing the exact amount of anesthesia for sterilization. Also, it has oxygenation and heart rate sensors to monitor the animal's vital signs and report them on a touch screen with LEDs and sound activated as an alert if these signs are close to high or low parameters, fixed according to the species, breed, and gender of the animal. Further, it includes steps to follow for its correct and efficient use, designed as a deployable unit for field work and being easily moved.

column12: Treatment method of pure titanium personalized abutment
column13: The invention discloses a treatment method of a pure titanium personalized abutment. The treatment method comprises the following steps of designing an abutment by using design software according to the obtained jaw bone model condition of a patient, and inputting data of the abutment into CAD\CAM equipment for processing to obtain a personalized pure titanium abutment; mounting the processed puretitanium abutment on a jaw bone model, and recording an upper jaw frame according to a jaw; adjusting the size and the insertion path of the pure titanium abutment; performing fine trimming on the pure titanium abutment, and then performing polishing and cleaning treatment; and performing anodic oxidation treatment on the surface of a gum penetrating part of the pure titanium abutment. A parallelgrinding instrument is used for ensuring that a single pure titanium abutment does not have undercuts, and two or more pure titanium abutments obtain a consistent common insertion path. An anode electroplating process is used for the gum penetrating part of the pure titanium abutment, so that the corrosion resistance and the wear resistance of the pure titanium abutment are enhanced, the color ofthe gum penetrating part is close to the color of the gum, and the attractive effect is achieved; The treatment method is suitable for all metal restorations of titanium and titanium alloys in dentalrestoration.

column12: Workbench for visual communication design
column13: The utility model discloses a working table for visual communication design, which comprises a design table body, the top of the design table body is provided with a working table, four side surfaces of the design table body are respectively provided with a seat storage groove, a second electric telescopic rod is arranged in each seat storage groove, one end of each second electric telescopic rod is provided with a seat, and the other end of each second electric telescopic rod is provided with a seat. Foot brake type rolling wheels are installed at the bottoms of the seats, first electric telescopic rods are installed at the four corners of the top of the workbench, the workbench can be jointly designed and used by multiple persons, the seats can be provided for all stations, the seats can be automatically unfolded and folded, the design area of the workbench can be increased according to design requirements, and the working efficiency is improved. According to the working table, data can be conveyed to each station, illumination can be provided for each station, the working table can still be normally used under the condition of power failure, the overall stability performance is high, the shaking phenomenon cannot occur during use, designed works can be stored, and people can operate and use the working table conveniently.

column12: System and Method for correcting multiple variable performance of power generation facility objects
column13: Disclosed is a multivariate performance correction system for power generation facilities which can check in real time expected operating values for major performance factors of each unit device and major points in the system under current operating conditions. The multivariable performance correction system for power generation facilities includes: a number of sensors which generate current operation information for a power plant target; a plurality of collection devices collecting the current driving information in real time; and a management server generating a thermodynamic system model using design information of the power generation facility target and calculating correction performance efficiency using the thermodynamic system model and the current operation information.
column15: KIM DONG GYU;;JANG SEOK WON;;CHOI JI EUN

column12: Mask synthesis using design guided offset
column13: Aspects described herein relate to mask synthesis using design guide offsets. Based on the design of the integrated circuit, a target shape is obtained on an image surface to be manufactured using a mask. Rays emitted from the corresponding anchor points are generated. The anchor point is on a boundary of the target shape or on a boundary of a mask shape of the mask. For each of the rays, a distance between a first intersection of the respective ray and a boundary of the target shape and a second intersection of the respective ray and a boundary of the mask shape is defined. An analysis is performed by one or more processors, wherein the analysis is configured to modify the distance based on an error between a target shape and a resulting shape simulated on the image surface caused by the mask shape.

column12: ANTENNA DESIGN PROGRAM, ANTENNA DESIGN METHOD, AND INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE
column13: To shorten a design time of a patch antenna.SOLUTION: A computer detects a frequency at which a reflection coefficient of a patch antenna is minimized on the basis of the result of electromagnetic field simulation using design information of a patch antenna, and calculates a side length (ly) of a patch 15b of the patch antenna that reduces the reflection coefficient at the operating frequency on the basis of the comparison result between a specified operating frequency and the detected frequency. In addition, the computer uses the trajectory of the input impedance of the patch antenna on the Smith chart obtained from the results of the electromagnetic field simulation to calculate a feeding position (position of a feeding point 15d) that brings the input impedance at the operating frequency closer to the center point of the Smith chart.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

column12: Systems and Methods for Outfit Customization via a Dynamic and Interactive User Interface
column13: A style-driven system may create a holistic shopping experience by generating a user interface (“UI”) with interactive controls and a single presentation for an outfit with two or more items selected from two or more different categories of goods having different utilities or purposes. The single presentation may provide a comprehensive and holistic presentation of the outfit by presenting the items together with a particular arrangement. The holistic shopping experience may include selecting a set of substitute items that are in a same category of goods as a particular item of the outfit and that have one or more style attributes in common with the particular item, and modifying the UI by presenting the set of substitute items for the particular item, and by replacing the particular item in the particular arrangement with a selected substitute item from the set of substitute items.

column12: HIGH ACCURACY OF RELATIVE DEFECT LOCATIONS FOR REPEATER ANALYSIS
column13: Methods and systems for transforming positions of defects detected on a wafer are provided. One method includes aligning output of an inspection subsystem for a first frame in a first swath in a first die in a first instance of a multi-die reticle printed on the wafer to the output for corresponding frames, swaths, and dies in other reticle instances printed on the wafer. The method also includes determining different swath coordinate offsets for each of the frames, respectively, in the other reticle instances based on the swath coordinates of the output for the frames and the corresponding frames aligned thereto and applying one of the different swath coordinate offsets to the swath coordinates reported for the defects based on the other reticle instances in which they are detected thereby transforming the swath coordinates for the defects from swath coordinates in the other reticle instances to the first reticle instance.

column12: MULTI-AGENT DEEP REINFORCEMENT LEARNING FOR DYNAMICALLY CONTROLLING ELECTRICAL EQUIPMENT IN BUILDINGS
column13: Reinforcement Learning agent interacting with a real-world building to determine optimal policy may not be viable due to comfort constraints. Embodiments of the present disclosure provide multi-deep agent RL for dynamically controlling electrical equipment in buildings, wherein a simulation model is generated using design specification of (i) controllable electrical equipment (or subsystem) and (ii) building. Each RL agent is trained using simulation model and deployed in the subsystem. Reward function for each subsystem includes some portion of reward from other subsystem(s). Based on reward function of each RL agent, each RL agent learns an optimal control parameter during execution of RL agent in subsystem. Further, a global optimal control parameter list is generated using the optimal control parameter. The control parameters in the global optimal control parameters list are fine-tuned to improve subsystem's performance. Information on fine-tuning parameters of the subsystem and reward function are used for training RL agents.

column12: Methods and Systems of Generating Simulation Grids for Different Structural Interpretations
column13: Geologic modeling methods and systems may use design-space to design-space mapping to facilitate simulation grid generation for multiple interpretations of a subsurface region. As one example, one or more embodiments of a geologic modeling method may comprise: obtaining first and second geologic models having different structural interpretations of a subsurface region; mapping each of the geologic models to associated design space models representing an unfaulted subsurface region; determining a design-to-design space mapping from the first design space model to the second design space model; using said mapping to copy parameter values from the first design space model to the second of the design space model; gridding each of the design space models to obtain design space meshes; partitioning cells in the first and second design space meshes along faults; reverse mapping the partitioned design space meshes to the physical space to obtain first and second physical space simulation meshes.
column15: MIAO SHA;;XU YIFEI;;HUANG HAO;;CASTRO SCARLET A

column12: Method for Providing Information Generated by Failure Mode and Effect Analysis
column13: The present invention relates to a method for providing failure mode effect analysis (FMEA) information. The method for providing FMEA information in a device for providing FMEA information comprises the steps of: obtaining failure history information and material organization specification information of a target product; generating FMEA information by matching the obtained failure history information with the obtained material organization specification information; providing the generated FMEA information in response to the input of a user using a user interface; obtaining result information of a design simulation which is based on a numerical model implemented using design information including the dimensions of the target product and the values of the quality of the material and reflects the provided FMEA information; and updating the FMEA information by generating correlation information by the interaction between at least two parts of the target product included in the FMEA information generated in the step of generating, based on result information of the obtained design simulation. Therefore, a means for automatically generating and providing FMEA information from failure history information can be provided.

column12: Robot clamping jaw
column13: The utility model discloses a robot clamping jaw, which relates to the technical field of robot equipment and comprises an electric rotating table, a rotating disc is mounted on the bottom surface of the electric rotating table, an assembly frame is fixedly connected to the bottom surface of the rotating disc, and two symmetrical first sliding grooves are formed in the bottom surface of the assembly frame. And the inner walls of the two first sliding grooves are each slidably connected with two symmetrical sliding blocks, limiting mechanisms are arranged on the bottom faces of the two sliding blocks, a clamping mechanism is arranged on the outer surface of the assembly frame, and two symmetrical clamping jaw bodies are arranged below the assembly frame. Through the arrangement of the limiting mechanism, the clamping jaw body and the clamping teeth can be limited, when articles of different types need to be clamped and fixed and the clamping jaw needs to be replaced, the limiting mechanism can rapidly release limiting on the clamping jaw body for replacement, rapid installation can be achieved during installation, the overall structure is simple, and the clamping jaw is convenient to use. Design is reasonable, stability is good, practicability is high, and the transportation efficiency of the robot is improved.
column14: ZHIXI ROBOT MFG HUBEI CO LTD

column12: Method for optimizing open space time-sharing use design in community micro-update
column13: The invention provides a method for optimizing open space time-sharing use design in community micro-update, which comprises the following steps of: dividing a region into a grid map consisting of regular grid units according to an open space range in a target community, and assigning values to attributes of all the grid units according to land use types; determining the floor area of the single main body; confirming a multi-purpose open space plot capable of bearing the motor vehicle; establishing a multi-objective optimization model for the community multi-purpose open space; a classic multi-target genetic algorithm NSGA-II is adopted to carry out rapid calculation; and selecting time interval values of a plurality of different targets, adjusting parameters according to actual experience, then performing simulation, and selecting a time-sharing utilization time interval suitable for the target community and a Pareto optimal solution of the time-sharing utilization time interval. According to the method, the certainty of the planning effect is effectively improved, the utilization rate of the existing open space in the community is maximized, and the increasing parking demand and the daily activity demand are met.

column12: Electromagnetic field sensor, design method, and fault distance measuring device and positioning method
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of power grid fault distance measurement, and discloses an electromagnetic field sensor, a design method, and a fault distance measuring device and positioning method. The design method comprises the steps of: calculating a spiral growth rate parameter of an Archimedes spiral antenna; determining a spiral outer diameter, a spiral inner diameter and a perimeter; and calculating the line warp width and the pitch width. The fault positioning method comprises the steps of: recording a sampled electromagnetic field signal by using designed electric and magnetic field sensors; when signals received by the electric field sensor and the magnetic field sensor exceed a threshold, recording current triggering moments t1, t2, t3 and t4; calculating a traveling wave signal, v and a cable fault point positioning position; and uploading a calculation result to a background, and giving an alarm. According to the invention, the problem of power taking of a traditional online fault distance measuring device in a high-voltage power transmission line is solved, power supply by a power taking CT is not adopted, power is supplied by a storage battery and a photovoltaic panel, and the sustainability of power supply is ensured.
column15: LIU YONGCUN;;YI DENGFU;;HONG YUN;;CHEN ZE;;CHEN HAOXIN

column12: Multi-stage full-band speech enhancement method based on frequency spectrum compression and neural network
column13: The invention discloses a multi-stage full-band speech enhancement method based on spectrum compression and a neural network. The method comprises the following steps: designing a full-band speech spectrum compression curve, and initializing a spectrum compression module of the MHA-DPCRN by using designed parameters; synthesizing a simulated noisy reverberation voice; performing short-time Fourier transform on the simulated noisy reverberation voice and the corresponding pure voice with reverberation to obtain short-time Fourier spectrums of the two; training the weight of the MHA-DPCRN model by using a short-time Fourier spectrum; (5) performing short-time Fourier transform on the noise-containing reverberation voice to be enhanced to obtain a short-time Fourier spectrum; and inputting the short-time Fourier spectrum of the noisy reverberation speech into the trained model to obtain the short-time Fourier spectrum of the enhanced speech, and performing inverse short-time Fourier transform to obtain a time domain signal of the enhanced speech. According to the method provided by the invention, relatively thorough noise suppression can be carried out on full-band voice in a complex noise scene, and meanwhile, relatively good voice quality is kept.
column14: UNIV NANJING;;BEIJING HORIZON INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
column15: HOU ZHONGSHU;;HU QINWEN;;LU JING;;ZHU CHANGBAO;;ZHU TIANYI;;LIU SONG

column12: Electric power supply box capable of induction self-cooling
column13: The utility model discloses an electric power supply box capable of induction self-cooling, comprising a box body, and the outer side wall of the box body is movably connected with a door body. According to the electric power supply box, the temperature sensor is installed at the top end in the box body, when the temperature in the box body is too high, the temperature sensor can monitor the temperature in the box body, and once the temperature in the box body rises to a certain range, the temperature sensor senses an alarm and transmits information to the control switch; the control switch controls the cooling fans arranged on the two sides of the box body to work, convection blowing of the interior of the box body is completed, rapid cooling of the interior of the box body is achieved, heat exchange of heat flow can be completed through the effect of the cooling grooves, it can be guaranteed that the interior of the box body is not too high, self-cooling is effectively monitored through use, design is more convenient, and the service life of the box body is prolonged. And when the temperature sensor in the box body senses that the temperature is reduced, the cooling fan can be controlled to stop cooling, electric quantity is not wasted, and more energy and consumption are saved in use.
column14: BAZHOU POWER SUPPLY COMPANY STATE GRID XINJIANG ELECTRIC POWER CO LTD
column15: WANG JINZHONG;;MA YONGSHU;;LI DONG;;SU DONGDONG;;MIRIGULI KEREMU;;PENG NA;;LU CHANGQING

column12: COMPUTER AIDED SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR CREATING CUSTOM PRODUCTS
column13: A computer-aided design (CAD) system enables physical articles to be customized via printing or embroidering and enables digital content to be customized and electronically shared. A CAD user interface may be generated that includes an image of a model of an article of manufacture and a customizable template. The customizable template may include user customizable design areas. One or more defined rules associated with respective customizable areas may be accessed. In response to a user selection of a default content item and a corresponding rule, content items may be automatically used to populate other template design areas and/or change a color of one or content items. Manufacturing instructions corresponding to the user customizations may be transmitted to a printing system using a file that includes location, rotation, and/or scale data.

column12: Measurement processing device, x-ray inspection apparatus, method for manufacturing structure, measurement processing method, x-ray inspection method, measurement processing program, and x-ray inspection program
column13: A measurement processing device used for an x-ray inspection apparatus that detects an x-ray passing through a predetermined region of a specimen placed on a placement unit to perform an inspection on the shape of the predetermined region of the specimen includes: a setting unit that sets a three-dimensional region to be detected on the specimen; and a sliced-region selection unit that sets a plurality of sliced regions on the region to be detected, calculates, for each of the plurality of sliced regions, an amount of displacement of the predetermined region that is required to detect the region to be detected when the plurality of sliced regions is regarded as the predetermined region, and selects a sliced region for the inspection from among the plurality of sliced regions on the basis of each of the calculated amounts of displacement.
